objectModel.name: VR-Link20017.xml
objectModel.other: Created with Visual OMT 1516. RPR 2 draft 17 with ViewControl, LoggerControl, PVD View Control, and BaseEntityOther added

objectClass.name: ActiveSonarBeam
objectClass.semantics: A sector of concentrated energy from a device that radiates an active sonar signal.

attribute.name: ActiveEmissionParameterIndex
attribute.semantics: An index into the database of active (intentional) underwater acoustics emissions.

attribute.name: AzimuthBeamwidth
attribute.semantics: The horizontal beam width of the main beam (as opposed to any side lobes) measured at the 3 dB down point of peak radiated power level. Omni directional beams shall have a beam width of 0 radians.

attribute.name: AzimuthCenter
attribute.semantics: The center azimuthal bearing of the main beam (as opposed to side lobes) in relation to the emitter coordinate system. Omnidirection beams shall have an azimuthal center of 0 radians.

attribute.name: BeamIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The identification of the active sonar beam, which must be unique on the active sonar system.

attribute.name: ScanPattern
attribute.semantics: The pattern that describes the movement of the sonar beam of the emitter.

objectClass.name: BaseEntity
objectClass.semantics: A base class of aggregate and discrete scenaro domain participants. The BaseEntity class is characterised by being located at a particular location in space and independently movable, if capable of movement at all. It specifically excludes elements normally considered to be a component of another element. The BaseEntity class is intended to be a container for common attributes for entities of this type. Since it lacks sufficient class specific attributes that are required for simulation purposes it is not expected that any federate shall publish objects of this class. Certain simulation management federates, e.g. viewers, may subscribe to this class. Simulation federates will normally subscribe to one of the subclasses, to gain the extra information required to properly simulate the entity. (See section 6.1 of the GRIM)

attribute.name: EntityType
attribute.semantics: The category of the entity.

attribute.name: EntityIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The unique identifier for the entity instance.

attribute.name: IsPartOf
attribute.semantics: Defines if the entity if a constituent part of another entity (denoted the host entity). If the entity is a constituent part of another entity then the ParentEntityID shall be set to the EntityID of the host entity and the ParentRTIObjectID shall be set to the RTO object ID of the host entity. If the entity is not a constituent part of another entity then the ParentEntityID shall being set to 0.0.0 and the ParentRTIObjectID shall be set to the empty string.

attribute.name: Spatial
attribute.semantics: Spatial state stored in one variant record attribute

attribute.name: RelativeSpatial
attribute.semantics: Relative spatial state stored in one variant record attribute

objectClass.name: BaseEntityOther
objectClass.semantics: An object of other base entity type.

objectClass.name: AggregateEntity
objectClass.semantics: A group of one or more separate objects that operate together as part of an organization. These objects may be discrete, may be other aggregate objects, or may be a mixture of both.

attribute.name: AggregateMarking
attribute.semantics: A unique marking or combination of characters used to distinguish the aggregate from other aggregates.

attribute.name: AggregateState
attribute.semantics: An indicator of the extent of association of objects form an operating group.

attribute.name: Dimensions
attribute.semantics: The size of the area covered by the units in the aggregate.

attribute.name: EntityIdentifiers
attribute.semantics: The identification of entities that are contained within the aggregate.

attribute.name: ForceIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The identification of the force that the aggregate belongs to.

attribute.name: Formation
attribute.semantics: The category of positional arrangement of the entities within the aggregate.

attribute.name: NumberOfSilentEntities
attribute.semantics: The number of elements in the SilentEntities list

attribute.name: NumberOfVariableDatums
attribute.semantics: The number of records in the Variable Datum structure

attribute.name: SilentAggregates
attribute.semantics: The numbers and types, of slient aggregates contained in the aggregate. Silent aggregates are sub-aggregates that are in the aggregate, but that are not separately represented in the virtual world.

attribute.name: SilentEntities
attribute.semantics: The numbers and types, of silent entities in the aggregate. Silent entites are entities that are in the aggregate, but that are not separately represented in the virtual world.

attribute.name: SubAggregateIdentifiers
attribute.semantics: The identifications of aggregates represented in the virtual world that are contained in the aggregate.

attribute.name: VariableDatums
attribute.semantics: Extra data that describes the aggregate.

objectClass.name: EnvironmentalEntity
objectClass.semantics: An object which has physical extent but not necessarily fixed size and shape, such as meteorological effects such as clouds.

attribute.name: OpacityCode
attribute.semantics: The density of the environment entity.

objectClass.name: PhysicalEntity
objectClass.semantics: A base class of all discrete platform scenario domain participants.

attribute.name: AcousticSignatureIndex
attribute.semantics: Index used to obtain the acoustics (sound through air) signature state of the entity

attribute.name: AlternateEntityType
attribute.semantics: The category of entity to be used when viewed by entities on the \"opposite\" side.

attribute.name: ArticulatedParametersArray
attribute.semantics: Identification of the visible parts, and their states, of the entity which are capable of independent motion.

attribute.name: CamouflageType
attribute.semantics: The type of camouflage in use (if any).

attribute.name: DamageState
attribute.semantics: The state of damage of the entity.

attribute.name: EngineSmokeOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity\'s engine is generating smoke or not.

attribute.name: FirePowerDisabled
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity\'s main weapon system has been disabled or not.

attribute.name: FlamesPresent
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity is on fire (with visible flames) or not.

attribute.name: ForceIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The identification of the force that the entity belongs to.

attribute.name: HasAmmunitionSupplyCap
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity has the capability to supply other entities with ammunition.

attribute.name: HasFuelSupplyCap
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity has the capability to supply other entities with fuel or not.

attribute.name: HasRecoveryCap
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity has the capability to recover other entities or not.

attribute.name: HasRepairCap
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity has the capability to repair other entities or not.

attribute.name: Immobilized
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity is immobilized or not.

attribute.name: InfraredSignatureIndex
attribute.semantics: Index used to obtain the infra-red signature state of the entity

attribute.name: IsConcealed
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity is concealed or not.

attribute.name: LiveEntityMeasuredSpeed
attribute.semantics: The entity\'s own measurement of speed (e.g. air speed for aircraft)

attribute.name: Marking
attribute.semantics: A unique marking or combination of characters used to distinguish the entity from other entities.

attribute.name: PowerPlantOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity\'s power plant is on or not.

attribute.name: PropulsionSystemsData
attribute.semantics: The basic operating data of the propulsion systems aboard the entity

attribute.name: RadarCrossSectionSignatureIndex
attribute.semantics: Index used to obtain the radar cross section signature state of the entity

attribute.name: SmokePlumePresent
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity is generating smoke or not (intentional or unintentional).

attribute.name: TentDeployed
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity has deployed tent or not.

attribute.name: TrailingEffectsCode
attribute.semantics: The type and size of any trail that the entity is making.

attribute.name: VectoringNozzleSystemData
attribute.semantics: The basic operational data for the vectoring nozzle systems aboard the entity

objectClass.name: Platform
objectClass.semantics: A physical object under the control of armed forces upon which sensor, communication, or weapon systems may be mounted.

attribute.name: AfterburnerOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity\'s afterburner is on or not.

attribute.name: AntiCollisionLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity\'s anti-collision lights are on or not.

attribute.name: BlackOutBrakeLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity\'s black out brake lights are on or not.

attribute.name: BlackOutLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity\'s black out lights are on or not.

attribute.name: BrakeLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity\'s brake lights are on or not.

attribute.name: FormationLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity\'s formation lights are on or not.

attribute.name: HatchState
attribute.semantics: The state of the entity\'s (main) hatch.

attribute.name: HeadLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity\'s headlights are on or not.

attribute.name: InteriorLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity\'s internal lights are on or not.

attribute.name: LandingLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity\'s landing lights are on or not.

attribute.name: LauncherRaised
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity\'s weapon launcher is in the raised position.

attribute.name: NavigationLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity\'s navigation lights are on or not.

attribute.name: RampDeployed
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity has deployed a ramp or not.

attribute.name: RunningLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity\'s running lights are on or not.

attribute.name: SpotLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity\'s spotlights are on or not.

attribute.name: TailLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity\'s tail lights are on or not.

objectClass.name: Aircraft
objectClass.semantics: A platform entity that operates mainly in the air, such as aircraft, balloons, etc. This includes the entities when they are on the ground

objectClass.name: AmphibiousVehicle
objectClass.semantics: A platform entity that can operate both on the land and the sea.

objectClass.name: GroundVehicle
objectClass.semantics: A platform entity that operates wholy on the surface of the earth.

objectClass.name: MultiDomainPlatform
objectClass.semantics: A platform entity that operates in more than one domain (excluding those combinations explicitly defined as subclasses of the superclass of this class).

objectClass.name: Spacecraft
objectClass.semantics: A platform entity that operates mainly in space.

objectClass.name: SubmersibleVessel
objectClass.semantics: A platform entity that operates either on the surface of the sea, or beneath it.

objectClass.name: SurfaceVessel
objectClass.semantics: A platform entity that operates wholy on the surface of the sea.

objectClass.name: Lifeform
objectClass.semantics: A living military platform (human or not)

attribute.name: FlashLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the lifeform\'s flash lights are on or not.

attribute.name: StanceCode
attribute.semantics: The stance of the lifeform.

attribute.name: PrimaryWeaponState
attribute.semantics: The state of the soldier\'s primary weapon system.

attribute.name: SecondaryWeaponState
attribute.semantics: The state of the soldier\'s secondary weapon system.

attribute.name: ComplianceState
attribute.semantics: The compliance of the lifeform.

objectClass.name: Human
objectClass.semantics: A human lifeform

objectClass.name: NonHuman
objectClass.semantics: An animal or other non-human lifeform

objectClass.name: CulturalFeature
objectClass.semantics: Engineering and natural effects such as craters, bridges, vehicle tracks, etc.

attribute.name: ExternalLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the cultural feature\'s external lights are on or not.

attribute.name: InternalHeatSourceOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the cultural feature\'s internal heat source is on or not.

attribute.name: InternalLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the cultural feature\'s internal lights are on or not.

objectClass.name: Expendables
objectClass.semantics: Countermeasures devices that are dispensed from another entity. The devices may be active emitters or passive reflectors of energy.

objectClass.name: Munition
objectClass.semantics: A complete device charged with explosives, propellants, pyrotechnics, initiating composition, or nuclear, biological or chemical material for use in military operations, including demolitions.

attribute.name: LauncherFlashPresent
attribute.semantics: Whether the flash of the munition being launched is present or not.

objectClass.name: Radio
objectClass.semantics: Electronic devices for the communication of both audio and data, operated by entities belonging to armed forces.

objectClass.name: Sensor
objectClass.semantics: Sensors and emitters, such as stand-alone radars, jammers, and detection systems, that are not part of another platform or system described by another Physical Entity, and are operated by armed forces.

attribute.name: AntennaRaised
attribute.semantics: Whether the sensor/emitter\'s antenna is raised or not.

attribute.name: BlackoutLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the sensor/emitter\'s blackout lights are on or not.

attribute.name: LightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the sensor/emitter\'s lights are on or not.

attribute.name: InteriorLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the sensor/emitter\'s interior lights are on or not.

attribute.name: MissionKill
attribute.semantics: Whether the sensor/emitter has sustained damage that will prevent it carrying out its mission or not (ew.g. damaged antenna).

objectClass.name: Supplies
objectClass.semantics: Supplies other than munitions, such as fuel, food and personnel.

objectClass.name: EmbeddedSystem
objectClass.semantics: A base class used to associate sensor and emitting systems with their parent entity object.

attribute.name: EntityIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The Entity Identifier of the object which this embedded system is a part of.

attribute.name: HostObjectIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The ID of the object of which this embedded system is part of.

attribute.name: RelativePosition
attribute.semantics: The position of the embedded system, relative to the host object\'s position.

objectClass.name: Designator
objectClass.semantics: A system used to designate or mark a location or object, such as a laser designator which supports a laser-guided weapon engagement.

attribute.name: CodeName
attribute.semantics: The code name of the designator system.

attribute.name: DesignatedObjectIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The object, if any, being designated.

attribute.name: DesignatorCode
attribute.semantics: The designator code, if any, in the designator beam.

attribute.name: DesignatorEmissionWavelength
attribute.semantics: The wavelength of the designator system.

attribute.name: DesignatorOutputPower
attribute.semantics: The output power of the designator system.

attribute.name: DesignatorSpotLocation
attribute.semantics: The location, in the world coordinate system, of the designator spot.

attribute.name: DeadReckoningAlgorithm
attribute.semantics: Dead reckoning algorithm used by the issuing object.

attribute.name: RelativeSpotLocation
attribute.semantics: The location of the designator spot, relative to the object being designated (if any).

attribute.name: SpotLinearAccelerationVector
attribute.semantics: The rate of change in linear velocity of the designator spot over time.

objectClass.name: EmitterSystem
objectClass.semantics: A device that radiates an electromagnetic signal, such as a radar or jammer.

attribute.name: EmitterFunctionCode
attribute.semantics: The function of the emitter system.

attribute.name: EmitterType
attribute.semantics: The name of the emitter system.

attribute.name: EmitterIndex
attribute.semantics: A unique number, which uniquely identifies the emitter system from other on the same host entity.

attribute.name: EventIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The EventIdentifier is used by the generating federate to associate related events. The event number shall start at one at the beginning of the exercise, and be incremented by one for each event.

objectClass.name: IFF
objectClass.semantics: Interrogator Friend or Foe (IFF) system, Air Traffic Control Beacon and Transponder system, collision avoidance and navigational aids systems

attribute.name: BeamAzimuthCenter
attribute.semantics: The angle, in azimuth, of the centre of the IFF beam\'s scan volume relative to the IFF system.

attribute.name: BeamAzimuthSweep
attribute.semantics: The angle, relative to the IFF system, indicating the half angle that the IFF beam sweeps through, in azimuth.

attribute.name: BeamElevationCenter
attribute.semantics: The angle, in elevation, of the centre of the IFF beam\'s scan volume relative to the IFF system.

attribute.name: BeamElevationSweep
attribute.semantics: The angle, relative to the IFF system, indicating the half angle that the IFF beam sweeps through, in elevation.

attribute.name: BeamSweepSync
attribute.semantics: The percentage of the way through the scan of the emitter beam.

attribute.name: EventIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Used to associate related events

attribute.name: FundamentalParameterData
attribute.semantics: The fundementental energy radiation characteristics of the IFF/ATC/NAVAIDS system

attribute.name: Layer2DataAvailable
attribute.semantics: Specifies if level 2 data is available for this IFF sysem. If level 2 data is available then the BeamAzimuthCenter, BeamAzimuthSweep, BeamElevationCenter, BeamElevationSweep, BeamSweepSync, FundamentalParameterData, SecondaryOperationalDataParameter1, and SecondaryOperationalDataParameter2 attributes shall be generated

attribute.name: SecondaryOperationalDataParameter1
attribute.semantics: Additional characteristics of the IFF/ATC/NAVAIDS emitting system.

attribute.name: SecondaryOperationalDataParameter2
attribute.semantics: Additional characteristics of the IFF/ATC/NAVAIDS emitting system.

attribute.name: SystemMode
attribute.semantics: The technique used to determine friend or foe identification. Modes may be 1-4, C or S.

attribute.name: SystemName
attribute.semantics: Name of the IFF system in use.

attribute.name: SystemType
attribute.semantics: Type of IFF system in use.

attribute.name: SystemIsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether or not the system is on.

attribute.name: SystemIsOperational
attribute.semantics: Whether or not the system is operational.

objectClass.name: NatoIFF
objectClass.semantics: NATO Identification Friend or Foe (IFF) system that uses electromagnetic transmissions to which friendly forces\' equipment automatically responds.

objectClass.name: NatoIFFInterrogator
objectClass.semantics: The part of an IFF system that first transmits electromagnetic signals.

objectClass.name: NatoIFFTransponder
objectClass.semantics: The part of a specific IFF system that responds (for example by emitting pulses) to the electromagnetic signals.

objectClass.name: SovietIFF
objectClass.semantics: Soviet type IFF system

objectClass.name: SovietIFFInterrogator
objectClass.semantics: Soviet IFF Interrogator

objectClass.name: SovietIFFTransponder
objectClass.semantics: Soviet IFF Transponder

objectClass.name: RRB
objectClass.semantics: RRB IFF transponder system

attribute.name: Code
attribute.semantics: RRB Code (range 0-16)

objectClass.name: MinefieldData
objectClass.semantics: Provides information on individual mines contained within a minefield

attribute.name: GroundBurialDepthOffset
attribute.semantics: Specifies the offset of the origin of the mine coordinate system with respect to the ground surface. This offset can be used in conjunction with the mine orienteation to determine the actual ground burial depth of the surfaces of a mine. Ground burial depth offset is specified as a positive measurement in meteres below the wate surface along the up vector.

attribute.name: Fusing
attribute.semantics: Specifies the primary and secondary fuse and anti-handling device for each mine.

attribute.name: MineEmplacementTime
attribute.semantics: Specifies the real-world (UTC) emplacement time of the mine.

attribute.name: MineEntityIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Specifies the mine entity identifier number. The mine ID in conjunction with the MinefieldID form the unique identifier for each mine.

attribute.name: MinefieldIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Identifies the minefield to which the mines belong

attribute.name: MineLocation
attribute.semantics: Specifies the location of the relative to the minfield location.

attribute.name: MineOrientation
attribute.semantics: Specifies the orientation of the center axis direction of fire of the mine, relative to the minefield Coordinate System. If any of the three burial depth offsets is sent in the Record , this field shall also be sent.

attribute.name: MineType
attribute.semantics: Specifies the type of each mine contained within the minefield interaction

attribute.name: NumberTripDetonationWires
attribute.semantics: Specifies the number of trip detonation wires that exist for each mine. I sub n designates the trip wire count for mine n of N.

attribute.name: NumberWireVertices
attribute.semantics: Specifies the number of vertices are in each trip wire. A set of I sub n vertex counts is given for each mine n of N, iff I sub n > 0. If I sub n is 0, the vertex count set is empty. Each non empty set of vertex counts (I sub n > 0) follows the previous non empty set. J sub i designates the vertex count of tripwire i of I sub n.

attribute.name: PaintScheme
attribute.semantics: Specifies the camouflage scheme/color of the mine.

attribute.name: Reflectance
attribute.semantics: Specifies the local dielectric difference between the mine and the surrounding soil.

attribute.name: ScalarDetectionCoefficient
attribute.semantics: Specifies the coefficient to be utilized to insure proper correlation between detctors located on different simulation platforms. In statistically based detection system applications, the detection system simulation will generally compare a random number against an internally calculated probability of detection. There are M (number of sensors) coefficients for each of the N mines. Question: all of type 1 first then all of type 2 OR all of mine 1 first then mine 2.

attribute.name: SensorTypes
attribute.semantics: In QRP mode, specifies the requesting sensor types which were specified in the minefield query. In heartbeat mode, specifies the sensor types that are bein served by the minefield.

attribute.name: SnowBurialDepthOffset
attribute.semantics: Specifies the offset of the origin of the mine coordinate system with respect to the snow surface. This offset can be used in conjuncition with the mine orientation to determine the actual snow baurial depth of the survaces of a mine. Snow burial depth offset is specified as a positive measurement in meters below the snow surface along the up vector.

attribute.name: ThermalContrast
attribute.semantics: Specifies the temperature difference between the mine and the surround soil in degrees Centigrade. In the case of a buried mine, the delta temperature shall be measured between the ground surface above the mine and the surrounding ground surface temperature.

attribute.name: WaterBurialDepthOffset
attribute.semantics: Specifies the offset of the origin of the mine coordinate system with respect to the water surface. This offset can be used in conjunction with the mine orienteation to determine the actual water burial depth of the surfaces of a mine. Water burial depth offset is specified as a positive measurement in meteres below the wate surface along the up vector.

attribute.name: WireVertices
attribute.semantics: Specifies the vertices in a trip wire. A set of J sub i vertices is given for each trip wire i of I sub n, iff I sub n is > 0 and J sub i > 0. If I sub n is 0 or J sub i is 0, the vertex set is empty. Each non empty set of verticies (J sub i > 0) follows the previous non empty set.

objectClass.name: RadioReceiver
objectClass.semantics: A device that converts incoming electromagnetic waves in the radio frequency range into information.

attribute.name: RadioIndex
attribute.semantics: A number that uniquely identifies this radio receiver from other receivers on the host entity.

attribute.name: ReceivedPower
attribute.semantics: The power of the received transmission.

attribute.name: ReceivedTransmitterIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The identification of the transmitter that generated the received radio signal.

attribute.name: ReceiverOperationalStatus
attribute.semantics: The state of the radio receiver.

objectClass.name: RadioTransmitter
objectClass.semantics: A device that sends out information encoded in electromagnetic waves in the radio frequency range.

attribute.name: AntennaPatternData
attribute.semantics: The radiation pattern of the radio\'s antenna.

attribute.name: CryptographicMode
attribute.semantics: The mode that the crypto system is in

attribute.name: CryptoSystem
attribute.semantics: The type of crypto system in use.

attribute.name: EncryptionKeyIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The identification of the key used to encrypt the radio signals being transmitted.

attribute.name: Frequency
attribute.semantics: The radio frequency of transmitted radio signals.

attribute.name: FrequencyBandwidth
attribute.semantics: The bandwidth of radio frequencies of transmitted radio signals.

attribute.name: RadioIndex
attribute.semantics: A number that uniquely identifies this radio transmitter from other transmitters on the host entity.

attribute.name: RadioInputSource
attribute.semantics: The source of input of the transmitted radio signals.

attribute.name: RadioSystemType
attribute.semantics: The type of radio transmitter.

attribute.name: RFModulationSystemType
attribute.semantics: The type of modulation system applied to the transmitted radio signal.

attribute.name: RFModulationType
attribute.semantics: The type of modulation applied to the transmitted radio signal.

attribute.name: SpreadSpectrum
attribute.semantics: Describes the spread spectrum characteristics of the transmission, such as frequency hopping or other spread spectrum transmission modes.

attribute.name: StreamTag
attribute.semantics: A globally unique identifier for the associated audio stream

attribute.name: TimeHopInUse
attribute.semantics: Whether the radio is using time hopping or not.

attribute.name: TransmittedPower
attribute.semantics: The power of the transmitted radio signals.

attribute.name: TransmitterOperationalStatus
attribute.semantics: The state of the radio transmitter.

attribute.name: WorldLocation
attribute.semantics: The location of the radio transmitter in the world coordinate system.

objectClass.name: UnderwaterAcousticsEmission
objectClass.semantics: The underwater acoustic classes used to communicate underwater acoustic active, intentional emissions and Passive Signature or Unintentional Emissions information. These emissions are used during undersea warfare scenarios to detect, classify, and track hostile forces when electronic warfare mechanisms are unavailable.

attribute.name: EventIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The generating federate uses the Event Identifier to associate related events. The event number begins at one at the beginning of the exercise and is incremented by one for each event.

objectClass.name: ActiveSonar
objectClass.semantics: Describes the state of an active sonar system.

attribute.name: AcousticName
attribute.semantics: Name of the electronic devices for the collection of information including sound-recording, sound-receiving, or sound-transmitting equipment.

objectClass.name: AdditionalPassiveActivities
objectClass.semantics: Describes the steady state component of non-propulsion passive emissions such as those held in the Additional Narrowband Database (ANDB).

attribute.name: IsSilent
attribute.semantics: Whether or not passive is silent.

objectClass.name: PropulsionNoise
objectClass.semantics: Describes the steady state component of unintended passive emissions that are normally associated with the power plant

attribute.name: HullMaskerOn
attribute.semantics: Whether or not a specific Hull Masker is on.

attribute.name: ShaftRateData
attribute.semantics: Information about each of the propulsion shafts associated with the entity. Shafts are defined from port to starboard, when looking from the stern to the bow.

objectClass.name: EmitterBeam
objectClass.semantics: A sector of concentrated energy from a device that radiates an electromagnetic signal. See also IEEE 1278.1-1995 Section 5.4.7.1.

attribute.name: BeamAzimuthCenter
attribute.semantics: The angle, in azimuth, of the centre of the emitter beam\'s scan volume relative to the emitter system.

attribute.name: BeamAzimuthSweep
attribute.semantics: The angle, relative to the emitter system, indicating the half angle that the emitter beam sweeps through, in azimuth.

attribute.name: BeamElevationCenter
attribute.semantics: The angle, in elevation, of the centre of the emitter beam\'s scan volume relative to the emitter system.

attribute.name: BeamElevationSweep
attribute.semantics: The angle, relative to the emitter system, indicating the half angle that the emitter beam sweeps through, in elevation.

attribute.name: BeamFunctionCode
attribute.semantics: The function of the emitter beam.

attribute.name: BeamIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The identification of the emitter beam (must be unique on the emitter system).

attribute.name: BeamParameterIndex
attribute.semantics: The index, into the federation specific emissions database, of the current operating mode of the emitter beam.

attribute.name: EffectiveRadiatedPower
attribute.semantics: The effective radiated power of the emitter beam.

attribute.name: EmissionFrequency
attribute.semantics: The centre frequency of the emitter beam.

attribute.name: EmitterSystemIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The identification of the emitter sysytem that is generating this emitter beam.

attribute.name: EventIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The EventIdentifier is used by the generating federate to associate related events. The event number shall start at one at the beginning of the exercise, and be incremented by one for each event.

attribute.name: FrequencyRange
attribute.semantics: The bandwidth of the frequencies covered by the emitter beam.

attribute.name: PulseRepetitionFrequency
attribute.semantics: The Pulse Repetition Frequency of the emitter beam.

attribute.name: PulseWidth
attribute.semantics: The pulse width of the emitter beam.

attribute.name: SweepSynch
attribute.semantics: The percentage of the way through the scan of the emitter beam.

objectClass.name: RadarBeam
objectClass.semantics: A sector of concentrated energy from a device that radiates an electromagnetic signal.

attribute.name: HighDensityTrack
attribute.semantics: When TRUE the receiving simulation should assume that all tqargets, that are in the scan pattern of the radar beam, are being tracked

attribute.name: TrackObjectIdentifiers
attribute.semantics: Identification of the objects (emitter beams) being tracked.

objectClass.name: JammerBeam
objectClass.semantics: An emitter beam that is designed to jam or otherwise interfere or confuse another emitter system

attribute.name: JammingModeSequence
attribute.semantics: The jamming mode technique or series of techniques being applied.

attribute.name: JammedObjectIdentifiers
attribute.semantics: Identification of the objects (emitter beams) being jammed.

attribute.name: HighDensityJam
attribute.semantics: When TRUE the receiving simulation should assume that all emitter beams, that are in the scan pattern of the jammer beam, are being jammed

objectClass.name: EnvironmentObject
objectClass.semantics: A base class of environment point, linear, or areal object classes.

attribute.name: ObjectIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Identifies the Environment Object (point, linear, or areal).

attribute.name: ReferencedObjectIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Identifies the object referencing the Environment Object.

attribute.name: ForceIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Identifies the force as friendly, opposing, or neutral.

objectClass.name: ArealObject
objectClass.semantics: A synthetic environment object that is geometrically anchored to the terrain with a set of three or more points, which come to a closure.

attribute.name: PointsData
attribute.semantics: The point locations that define the object

attribute.name: PercentComplete
attribute.semantics: Percent that the object is complete

attribute.name: DamagedAppearance
attribute.semantics: Amount of damange, from none to destroyed.

attribute.name: ObjectPreDistributed
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object was distributed before the state of the exercise.

attribute.name: Deactivated
attribute.semantics: Whether the object has been deactivated

attribute.name: Smoking
attribute.semantics: Whether the object is smoking

attribute.name: Flaming
attribute.semantics: Whether the object is flaming

objectClass.name: MinefieldObject
objectClass.semantics: A mine, mine weapon, mine row, mine strip, mine lane, or mine marker.

attribute.name: BreachedStatus
attribute.semantics: Amount of breaching, from NoBreaching to Cleared.

attribute.name: MineCount
attribute.semantics: Number of mines in the minefield.

objectClass.name: OtherArealObject
objectClass.semantics: Areal objects other than Minefield objects.

objectClass.name: LinearObject
objectClass.semantics: A synthetic environment object that has size and an orientation and is geometrically anchored to the terain with one point.

objectClass.name: BreachableLinearObject
objectClass.semantics: A linear object that can be broken or ruptured.

objectClass.name: BreachObject
objectClass.semantics: An environment object that has had a break or a rupture created.

objectClass.name: ExhaustSmokeObject
objectClass.semantics: An exhaust smoke object.

attribute.name: SegmentRecords
attribute.semantics: A description of exhaust smoke.

objectClass.name: MinefieldLaneMarkerObject
objectClass.semantics: A visible marker showing a cleared lane through a specific minefield.

attribute.name: SegmentRecords
attribute.semantics: A visible object that marks a clear lane through the minefield.

objectClass.name: OtherLinearObject
objectClass.semantics: Linear objects other than Breachable, Breach, Exhaust Smoke, or MinefieldLaneMarker objects.

objectClass.name: PointObject
objectClass.semantics: A synthetic environment object that is geometrically anchored to the terrain with a single point.

attribute.name: Location
attribute.semantics: The location of a specific entity based on x, y and z.

attribute.name: Orientation
attribute.semantics: The angles of rotation around the coordinate axis between the entity\'s attitude and the reference coordinate system axes. These are calculated as the Tait-Bryan Euler angles, specifying the successive rotations needed to transform from the world coordinate system to the entity coordinate system.

attribute.name: PercentComplete
attribute.semantics: Percent mission is complete.

attribute.name: DamagedAppearance
attribute.semantics: Amount of damage, from none to destroyed.

attribute.name: ObjectPreDistributed
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object was distributed before the state of the exercise.

attribute.name: Deactivated
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object is deactivated.

attribute.name: Smoking
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object is smoking.

attribute.name: Flaming
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object is flaming.

objectClass.name: BreachablePointObject
objectClass.semantics: A point object that can be broken or ruptured.

attribute.name: BreachedStatus
attribute.semantics: Amount of breaching, from NoBreaching to Cleared.

objectClass.name: BurstPointObject
objectClass.semantics: A burst point object

attribute.name: PercentOpacity
attribute.semantics: Object\'s opacity

attribute.name: CylinderSize
attribute.semantics: A specific circular area with assigned height components.

attribute.name: CylinderHeight
attribute.semantics: The assigned height for the cylinder.

objectClass.name: CraterObject
objectClass.semantics: A pit, depression, or cavity formed in the surface of the earth by an explosion. The depression\'s shape can range from saucer to conical, depending largely of the depth of burst.

objectClass.name: OtherPointObject
objectClass.semantics: Point objects other than Breachable, Bursts, Crater, RibbonBridge, or Structure objects.

objectClass.name: RibbonBridgeObject
objectClass.semantics: A ribbon bridge object

objectClass.name: StructureObject
objectClass.semantics: A structure object

objectClass.name: EnvironmentProcess
objectClass.semantics: Communicates information about environmental processes and effects.

attribute.name: ProcessIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Identify which process issued the udpate.

attribute.name: Type
attribute.semantics: Environmental Process Type. Encoded Bit Values Document (EBV-DOC) 12.3

attribute.name: ModelType
attribute.semantics: Model used for generating this condition or entity

attribute.name: EnvironmentProcessActive
attribute.semantics: Inactive process that should not be removed since it may become active.

attribute.name: SequenceNumber
attribute.semantics: Optional. If not used, set to EP_NO_DEQUENCE. Begins at zero and is incremented by one for each update sent.

attribute.name: EnvironmentRecData
attribute.semantics: List of State and Geometry records.

objectClass.name: GriddedData
objectClass.semantics: Depict global, spatially varying environmental effects

attribute.name: GridIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Identification of the environmental simulation application.

attribute.name: CoordinateSystem
attribute.semantics: Encoded Bit Values Document (EBV-DOC) Sec. 12.

attribute.name: NumberOfGridAxes
attribute.semantics: Number of attached grid axis records

attribute.name: ConstantGrid
attribute.semantics: Signal whether these axes are identical to those sent in previous update

attribute.name: EnvironmentType
attribute.semantics: Encoded Bit Values Document (EBV-DOC) Sec. 4,12.

attribute.name: Orientation
attribute.semantics: Orientation of grid

attribute.name: SampleTime
attribute.semantics: Time when this information is current.

attribute.name: TotalValues
attribute.semantics: Number of values that make up this grid

attribute.name: VectorDimension
attribute.semantics: Number of elements stored at each grid position

attribute.name: GridAxisInfo
attribute.semantics: Attached information about axes.

attribute.name: GridDataInfo
attribute.semantics: Attached data records

objectClass.name: Minefield
objectClass.semantics: An area of ground or water containing mines laid with or without a pattern.

attribute.name: ActiveStatus
attribute.semantics: Identifies the active status of the minefield

attribute.name: ForceIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Identifies the force to which the minefield belongs

attribute.name: Lane
attribute.semantics: Identifies whether the minefield has an active lane

attribute.name: MinefieldAppearanceType
attribute.semantics: Specifies the appearance inforation needed for displaying the symbology of the minefield as a doctrinal minefield graphic

attribute.name: MinefieldIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Uniquely identifies the minefield in association with the federate\'s site and host

attribute.name: MinefieldLocation
attribute.semantics: Indicates the location of the center of the minefield

attribute.name: MinefieldOrientation
attribute.semantics: Identifies the orientation of the minefield

attribute.name: MinefieldType
attribute.semantics: Identifies the minefield type

attribute.name: MineTypes
attribute.semantics: Specifies the type of each mine contained within the minefield

attribute.name: PerimeterPointCoordinates
attribute.semantics: Specifies the location of each perimter point, relative to the minefield location

attribute.name: ProtocolMode
attribute.semantics: Specifies the mode being used to communicate data about the minefield.

attribute.name: State
attribute.semantics: Whether or not the minefield has been deactivated.

objectClass.name: HLAmanager
objectClass.semantics: This object class is the root class of all MOM object classes

objectClass.name: HLAfederate
objectClass.semantics: This object class shall contain RTI state variables relating to a joined federate. The RTI shall publish it and shall register one object instance for each joined federate in a federation. Dynamic attributes that shall be contained in an object instance shall be updated periodically, where the period should be determined by an interaction of the class HLAmanager. HLAfederate.HLAadjust.HLAsetTiming. If this value is never set or is set to zero, no periodic up-date shall be performed by the RTI.

attribute.name: HLAfederateHandle
attribute.semantics: Handle of the joined federate returned by a Join Federation Execution service invocation

attribute.name: HLAfederateType
attribute.semantics: Type of the joined federate specified by the joined federate when it joined the federation

attribute.name: HLAfederateHost
attribute.semantics: Host name of the computer on which the joined federate is executing

attribute.name: HLARTIversion
attribute.semantics: Version of the RTI software being used

attribute.name: HLAFDDID
attribute.semantics: Identifier associated with the FDD data used by the joined federate

attribute.name: HLAtimeConstrained
attribute.semantics: Whether the time advance of the joined federate is constrained by other joined federates

attribute.name: HLAtimeRegulating
attribute.semantics: Whether the joined federate influences the time advancement of other joined federates

attribute.name: HLAasynchronousDelivery
attribute.semantics: Whether the RTI shall deliver receive-order messages to the joined federate while the joined federate's time manager state is not Time Advancing (only matters if the joined federate is time-constrained)

attribute.name: HLAfederateState
attribute.semantics: State of the joined federate

attribute.name: HLAtimeManagerState
attribute.semantics: State of the joined federate's time manager

attribute.name: HLAlogicalTime
attribute.semantics: Joined federate's logical time. Initial value of this information is initial value of time of the Time Representation Abstract Data Type (TRADT).

attribute.name: HLAlookahead
attribute.semantics: Minimum duration into the future that a TSO message will be scheduled. The value shall not be defined if the joined federate is not time-regulating)

attribute.name: HLAGALT
attribute.semantics: Joined federate's Greatest Available Logical Time (GALT). The value shall not be defined if GALT is not defined for the joined federate.

attribute.name: HLALITS
attribute.semantics: Joined federate's Least Incoming Time Stamp (LITS). The value shall not be defined if LITS is not defined for the joined federate.

attribute.name: HLAROlength
attribute.semantics: Number of RO messages queued for delivery to the joined federate.

attribute.name: HLATSOlength
attribute.semantics: Number of TSO messages queued for delivery to the joined federate

attribute.name: HLAreflectionsReceived
attribute.semantics: Total number of reflections received by the joined federate.

attribute.name: HLAupdatesSent
attribute.semantics: Total number of updates sent by the joined federate

attribute.name: HLAinteractionsReceived
attribute.semantics: Total number of interactions received by the joined federate.

attribute.name: HLAinteractionsSent
attribute.semantics: Total number of interactions sent by the joined federate. This information shall reflect related DDM usage.

attribute.name: HLAobjectInstancesThatCanBeDeleted
attribute.semantics: Total number of object instances whose HLAprivilegeToDeleteObject attribute is owned by the joined federate

attribute.name: HLAobjectInstancesUpdated
attribute.semantics: Total number of object instances for which the joined federate has invoked the Update Attribute Values service.

attribute.name: HLAobjectInstancesReflected
attribute.semantics: Total number of object instances for which the joined federate has had a Reflect Attribute Values service invocation.

attribute.name: HLAobjectInstancesDeleted
attribute.semantics: Total number of times the Delete Object Instance service was invoked by the joined federate since the federate joined the federation

attribute.name: HLAobjectInstancesRemoved
attribute.semantics: Total number of times the Remove Object Instance service was invoked for the joined federate since the federate joined the federation.

attribute.name: HLAobjectInstancesRegistered
attribute.semantics: Total number of times the Register Object Instance or Register Object Instance with Region service was invoked by the joined federate since the federate joined the federation.

attribute.name: HLAobjectInstancesDiscovered
attribute.semantics: Total number of times the Discover Object Instance service was invoked for the joined federate since the federate joined the federation

attribute.name: HLAtimeGrantedTime
attribute.semantics: Wall clock time duration that the federate has spent in the Time Granted state since the last update of this attribute.

attribute.name: HLAtimeAdvancingTime
attribute.semantics: Wall clock time duration that the federate has spent in the Time Advancing state since the last update of this attribute.

attribute.name: HLAconveyRegionDesignatorSets
attribute.semantics: Value of federate-specific Convey Region Designator Sets Switch.

objectClass.name: HLAfederation
objectClass.semantics: This object class shall contain RTI state variables relating to a federation execution. The RTI shall publish it and shall register one object instance for the federation execution. It shall not automatically update the values of the instance attributes; a joined federate shall use a Request Attribute Value Update service to obtain values for the instance attributes.

attribute.name: HLAfederationName
attribute.semantics: Name of the federation to which the joined federate belongs

attribute.name: HLAfederatesInFederation
attribute.semantics: Identifiers of joined federates that are joined to the federation

attribute.name: HLARTIversion
attribute.semantics: Version of the RTI software

attribute.name: HLAFDDID
attribute.semantics: Identifier associated with the FDD used in the relevant Create Federation Execution service invocation.

attribute.name: HLAlastSaveName
attribute.semantics: Name associated with the last federation state save (null if no saves have occurred)

attribute.name: HLAlastSaveTime
attribute.semantics: Logical time at which the last federation state timed save occurred. The value shall not be defined if no timed saves have occurred.

attribute.name: HLAnextSaveName
attribute.semantics: Name associated with the next federation state save (null if no saves are scheduled)

attribute.name: HLAnextSaveTime
attribute.semantics: Logical time at which the next federation state timed save is scheduled. The value shall not be defined if no timed saves are scheduled.

attribute.name: HLAautoProvide
attribute.semantics: Value of federation-wide Auto Provide Switch. Updated when value of switch changes

interactionClass.name: Acknowledge
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Managment (SIMAN) interaction designed to acknowledge receipt of a SIMAN PDU from a Simulation Manager federate and to inform the Simulation Manager federate whether the federate has implemented the request.

parameter.name: OriginatingEntity
parameter.semantics: The DIS entity ID of the entity or application sending the interaction.

parameter.name: ReceivingEntity
parameter.semantics: The DIS entity ID of the entity or application which is the intended recipient of the interaction.

parameter.name: RequestIdentifier
parameter.semantics: This field matches this response with the specific StartResume, StopFreeze, CreateEntity or RemoveEntity interaction sent by the simulation manager.

parameter.name: AcknowledgeFlag
parameter.semantics: The type of interaction being ackowledged.

parameter.name: ResponseFlag
parameter.semantics: The type of response made to the interaction by the recipient.

interactionClass.name: AcknowledgeR
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Managment (SIMAN) interaction designed to acknowledge receipt of a SIMAN PDU, with a specified acknowledgement protocol, from a Simulation Manager federate and to inform the Simulation Manager federate whether the federate has implemented the request.

interactionClass.name: AcousticTransient
interactionClass.semantics: Specifies the occurrence of a transient acoustic event such as torpedo tube floodings, hatch slams, and wrench drops.

interactionClass.name: ActionRequest
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction sent from a Simulation Manager federate to one or more federates to request that they perform a specified action.

parameter.name: OriginatingEntity
parameter.semantics: The DIS entity ID of the entity or application sending the interaction.

parameter.name: ReceivingEntity
parameter.semantics: The DIS entity ID of the entity or application which is the intended recipient of the interaction.

parameter.name: RequestIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The Request ID is a monotonically increasing integer identifier inserted by the Simulation Manager into all Simulation management interactions. It is used as a unique identifier to identify the latest in a series of competing requests and identifying acknowledgements.

parameter.name: ActionRequestCode
parameter.semantics: The action that the recipient(s) are requested to perform.

parameter.name: FixedDatums
parameter.semantics: Optional additional data items (types and values)

parameter.name: VariableDatumSet
parameter.semantics: Optional additional data items (types and values). These data items are not of fixed length.

interactionClass.name: ActionRequestR
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction sent from a Simulation Manager federate to one or more federates to request that they perform a specified action. The Simulation Manager federate specifies the acknowledgement protocol to be used.

parameter.name: AcknowledgementProtocol
parameter.semantics: The acknowledgement protocol to be used for a transaction

interactionClass.name: ActionResponse
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction designed to acknowledge receipt of an ActionResponse interaction from a Simulation Manager federate and to inform the Simulation Manager federate whether the federate has implemented the request.

parameter.name: OriginatingEntity
parameter.semantics: The DIS entity ID of the entity or application sending the interaction.

parameter.name: ReceivingEntity
parameter.semantics: The DIS entity ID of the entity or application which is the intended recipient of the interaction.

parameter.name: RequestIdentifier
parameter.semantics: This field matches this response with the specific ActionRequest interaction sent by the simulation manager.

parameter.name: RequestStatus
parameter.semantics: The status of the request that the recipient has been asked to perform.

parameter.name: FixedDatums
parameter.semantics: Additional, fixed length data items (types and values).

parameter.name: VariableDatumSet
parameter.semantics: Additional, non fixed length, data items (types and values).

interactionClass.name: ActionResponseR
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction designed to acknowledge receipt of an ActionResponseR interaction from a Simulation Manager federate and to inform the Simulation Manager federate whether the federate has implemented the request.

interactionClass.name: ActionRequestToObject
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction sent from a Simulation Manager federate to one or more specific object instances to request that they perform a specified action.

parameter.name: ObjectIdentifiers
parameter.semantics: The list of objects that are the intended recipients of this interaction.

parameter.name: ActionRequestCode
parameter.semantics: The action that the recipient(s) are intended to perform.

interactionClass.name: ActionRequestToObjectR
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction sent from a Simulation Manager federate to one or more specific object instances to request that they perform a specified action. The Simulation Manager federate specifies the acknowledgement protocol to be used.

parameter.name: AcknowledgementProtocol
parameter.semantics: The acknowledgement protocol to be used for this transaction

interactionClass.name: ActionResponseFromObject
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction designed to acknowledge receipt of an ActionResponseToObject interaction from a Simulation Manager federate and to inform the Simulation Manager federate whether the object has implemented the request.

parameter.name: ActionResult
parameter.semantics: The status of the request that the recipient has been asked to perform.

interactionClass.name: ActionResponseFromObjectR
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction designed to acknowledge receipt of an ActionResponseToObjectR interaction from a Simulation Manager federate and to inform the Simulation Manager federate whether the object has implemented the request.

interactionClass.name: AttributeChangeRequest
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction, sent from a Simulation Manager federate to ask that a specified attribute be set to a specified value.

parameter.name: ObjectIdentifiers
parameter.semantics: The list of objects that are the intended recipients of this interaction.

parameter.name: AttributeValueSet
parameter.semantics: The set of attributes and their values, that the recipients are asked to update.

interactionClass.name: AttributeChangeRequestR
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction, sent from a Simulation Manager federate to ask that a specified attribute be set to a specified value. The Simulation Manager federate specifies the acknowledgement protocol to be used.

parameter.name: AcknowledgementProtocol
parameter.semantics: The acknowledgement protocol to be used for a transaction

interactionClass.name: AttributeChangeResult
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction designed to acknowledge receipt of an AttributeChangeRequest interaction from a Simulation Manager federate, and to inform the Simulation Manager federate whether the attribute was set to the specified value or not.

parameter.name: ObjectIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The ID of the object replying to the AttributeChangeRequest interaction.

parameter.name: AttributeChangeResult
parameter.semantics: The result of the attribute change request.

parameter.name: AttributeValueSet
parameter.semantics: The set of attributes and their values that the recipient has been able to update.

interactionClass.name: AttributeChangeResultR
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction designed to acknowledge receipt of an AttributeChangeRequest interaction from a Simulation Manager federate, and to inform the Simulation Manager federate whether the attribute was set to the specified value or not. The Simulation Manager federate specifies the acknowledgement protocol to be used.

parameter.name: AcknowledgementProtocol
parameter.semantics: The acknowledgement protocol to be used for this transaction

interactionClass.name: Collision
interactionClass.semantics: The act or instance of coming together with solid impact.

parameter.name: CollidingObjectIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The ID of the object that the issuing object has collided with.

parameter.name: IssuingObjectMass
parameter.semantics: The mass of the issuing object.

parameter.name: IssuingObjectVelocityVector
parameter.semantics: The velocity vector of the issuing object at the moment of impact.

parameter.name: CollisionType
parameter.semantics: The type of collision.

parameter.name: CollisionLocation
parameter.semantics: The location of the collision relative to the object that the issuing object has collided with.

parameter.name: EventIdentifier
parameter.semantics: An ID assigned by the issuing object to associate related collision events.

parameter.name: IssuingObjectIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The ID of the object that has detected the collision and issued the collision interaction.

interactionClass.name: CollisionElastic
interactionClass.semantics: The act or instance of coming together with solid impact in an elastic manner. An elastic collision allows a higher fidelity collision to be modeled, taking into account linear and rotational momentum transfer, variable elasticity, and momentum transfer that is dependent on surface orientation.

parameter.name: CoefficientOfRestitution
parameter.semantics: The degree that energy is conserved in a collision.

parameter.name: IntermediateResultXX
parameter.semantics: X-X Component of the positive semi-definite Collision Intermediate Result matrix

parameter.name: IntermediateResultXY
parameter.semantics: X-Y Component of the positive semi-definite Collision Intermediate Result matrix

parameter.name: IntermediateResultXZ
parameter.semantics: X-Z Component of the positive semi-definite Collision Intermediate Result matrix

parameter.name: IntermediateResultYY
parameter.semantics: Y-Y Component of the positive semi-definite Collision Intermediate Result matrix

parameter.name: IntermediateResultYZ
parameter.semantics: Y-Z Component of the positive semi-definite Collision Intermediate Result matrix

parameter.name: IntermediateResultZZ
parameter.semantics: Z-Z Component of the positive semi-definite Collision Intermediate Result matrix

parameter.name: UnitSurfaceNormal
parameter.semantics: The normal vector to the surface at the point of collision detection

interactionClass.name: Comment
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction designed to allow data to be inserted onto the network.

parameter.name: OriginatingEntity
parameter.semantics: The DIS entity ID of the entity or application sending the interaction.

parameter.name: ReceivingEntity
parameter.semantics: The DIS entity ID of the entity or application which is the intended recipient of the interaction.

parameter.name: VariableDatumSet
parameter.semantics: The set of data items (types and values) associated with the interaction.

interactionClass.name: CreateEntity
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction, sent from a Simulation Manager to request that an application creates an entity. See DIS 4.5.5.4.1 and DIS 5.3.6 for details.

parameter.name: OriginatingEntity
parameter.semantics: The DIS entity ID of the entity or application sending the interaction.

parameter.name: ReceivingEntity
parameter.semantics: The FederateIdentifier field identifies the federate that is responsible for creating the entity (if possible). The complete parameter defines the entity ID of the new entity (see also note [18]).

parameter.name: RequestIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The Request ID is a monotonically increasing integer identifier inserted by the Simulation Manager into all Simulation management interactions. It is used as a unique identifier to identify the latest in a series of competing requests and identifying acknowledgements.

interactionClass.name: CreateEntityR
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction, sent from a Simulation Manager to request that an application creates an entity, using a specified acknowledgement service. See DIS 4.5.11.3.1 and DIS 5.3.12.1 for details.

parameter.name: AcknowledgementProtocol
parameter.semantics: The acknowledgement protocol to be used for a transaction

interactionClass.name: CreateObjectRequest
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction, sent from a Simulation Manager federate to another federate requesting that it create an object instance of a particular type.

parameter.name: ObjectClass
parameter.semantics: The class of object to be created.

parameter.name: AttributeValueSet
parameter.semantics: The set of attributes, and associated values, to be used to initialise the object.

parameter.name: RequestIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The Request ID is a monotonically increasing integer identifier inserted by the Simulation Manager into all Simulation management interactions. It is used as a unique identifier to identify the latest in a series of competing requests and identifying acknowledgements.

interactionClass.name: CreateObjectRequestR
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction, sent from a Simulation Manager federate to another federate requesting that it create an object instance of a particular type. The Simulation Manager federate specifies the acknowledgement protocol to be used.

parameter.name: AcknowledgementProtocol
parameter.semantics: The acknowledgement protocol to be used for a transaction

interactionClass.name: CreateObjectResult
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction designed to acknowledge receipt of a CreateObjectRequest from a Simulation Manager federate and to infrom the Simulation Manager federate whether the object creation was successful or not.

parameter.name: CreateObjectResult
parameter.semantics: The result of the create object request.

parameter.name: RequestIdentifier
parameter.semantics: This field matches this response with the specific CreateObject interaction sent by the simulation manager.

interactionClass.name: CreateObjectResultR
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction designed to acknowledge receipt of a CreateObjectRequest from a Simulation Manager federate and to infrom the Simulation Manager federate whether the object creation was successful or not. The Simulation Manager federate specifies the acknowledgement protocol to be used.

interactionClass.name: Data
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction designed to acknowledge either a) a DataQuery interaction (in which case the Data interaction contains the results of the query) or b) a SetData interaction (in which case the Data interaction contains the data that the federate was able to set).

parameter.name: OriginatingEntity
parameter.semantics: The DIS entity ID of the entity or application sending the interaction.

parameter.name: ReceivingEntity
parameter.semantics: The DIS entity ID of the entity or application which is the intended recipient of the interaction.

parameter.name: RequestIdentifier
parameter.semantics: This field matches this response with the specific SetData or DataQuery interaction sent by the simulation manager.

parameter.name: FixedDatums
parameter.semantics: The set of data items (types and values), of fixed length, that the recipient can return for this interaction.

parameter.name: VariableDatumSet
parameter.semantics: The set of data items (types and values), of variable length, that the recipient can return for this interaction.

interactionClass.name: DataR
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction designed to acknowledge either a) a DataQueryR interaction (in which case the DataR interaction contains the results of the query) or b) a SetDataR interaction (in which case the DataR interaction contains the data that the federate was able to set).

parameter.name: AcknowledgementProtocol
parameter.semantics: The acknowledgement protocol to be used for a transaction

interactionClass.name: DataQuery
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction, sent from a Simulation Manager federate to request that a federate supply the current values of specified data.

parameter.name: OriginatingEntity
parameter.semantics: The DIS entity ID of the entity or application sending the interaction.

parameter.name: ReceivingEntity
parameter.semantics: The DIS entity ID of the entity or application which is the intended recipient of the interaction.

parameter.name: RequestIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The Request ID is a monotonically increasing integer identifier inserted by the Simulation Manager into all Simulation management interactions. It is used as a unique identifier to identify the latest in a series of competing requests and identifying acknowledgements.

parameter.name: TimeInterval
parameter.semantics: The interval between regular updates of the requested data. If this field is zero then the recipient should only issue a single Data interaction in response to this interaction.

parameter.name: FixedDatumIdentifiers
parameter.semantics: The set of fixed length data items (types) that the recipient is requested to supply data for.

parameter.name: VariableDatumIdentifiers
parameter.semantics: The set of variable length data items (types) that the recipient is requested to supply data for.

interactionClass.name: DataQueryR
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction, sent from a Simulation Manager federate to request that a federate supply the current values of specified data. The Simulation Manager federate specifies the acknowledgement protocol to be used.

parameter.name: AcknowledgementProtocol
parameter.semantics: The acknowledgement protocol to be used for a transaction

interactionClass.name: EnvironmentObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: A base interaction for modifying instances of the point, linear, and areal environment object classes.

interactionClass.name: ArealObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction for modifying instances of the Areal Object class.

parameter.name: PointsData
parameter.semantics: The point locations that define the object

parameter.name: PercentComplete
parameter.semantics: Percent that the object is complete

parameter.name: DamagedAppearance
parameter.semantics: Damage appearance

parameter.name: ObjectPreDistributed
parameter.semantics: Whether or not the object was predistributed.

parameter.name: Deactivated
parameter.semantics: Whether or not the object has been deactivated.

parameter.name: Smoking
parameter.semantics: Whether or not the object is smoking.

parameter.name: Flaming
parameter.semantics: Whether or not the object is flaming.

interactionClass.name: MinefieldObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the MinefieldObject class.

parameter.name: BreachedStatus
parameter.semantics: Amount of breaching, from NoBreaching to Cleared.

parameter.name: MineCount
parameter.semantics: Number of mines in the minefield.

interactionClass.name: OtherArealObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the OtherArealObject class.

interactionClass.name: LinearObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction for modifying instances of the LinearObject class.

interactionClass.name: BreachableLinearObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the BreachableLinearObject class.

interactionClass.name: BreachObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the BreachObject class.

interactionClass.name: ExhaustSmokeObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the ExhaustSmokeObject class.

interactionClass.name: MinefieldLaneMarkerObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the MinefieldLaneMarkerObject class.

interactionClass.name: OtherLinearObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the OtherLinearObject class.

interactionClass.name: PointObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction for modifying instances of the PointObject class.

parameter.name: Location
parameter.semantics: The location of the entity based on x,y and z.

parameter.name: Orientation
parameter.semantics: The angles of rotation around the coordinate axis between the entity\'s attitude and the reference coordinate system axes, which are calculated as the Tait-Bryan Euler angles specifying the successive rotations needed to transform from the world coordinate system to the entity coordinate system.

parameter.name: PercentComplete
parameter.semantics: Percent mission is complete.

parameter.name: DamagedAppearance
parameter.semantics: Amount of damage, from none to destroyed.

parameter.name: ObjectPreDistributed
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object was distributed before the state of the exercise.

parameter.name: Deactivated
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object is deactivated.

parameter.name: Smoking
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object is smoking.

parameter.name: Flaming
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object is flaming.

interactionClass.name: BreachablePointObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the BreachablePointObject class.

parameter.name: BreachedStatus
parameter.semantics: Amount of breaching, from NoBreaching to Cleared.

interactionClass.name: BurstPointObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the BurstPointObject class.

parameter.name: PercentOpacity
parameter.semantics: The opacity of the object.

parameter.name: CylinderSize
parameter.semantics: A specific circular area with assigned height components.

parameter.name: CylinderHeight
parameter.semantics: The assigned height for the cylinder.

interactionClass.name: CraterObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the CraterObject class.

interactionClass.name: OtherPointObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the OtherPointObject class.

interactionClass.name: RibbonBridgeObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the RibbonBridgeObject class.

interactionClass.name: StructureObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the StructureObject class.

interactionClass.name: EventReport
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction designed to allow a federate to alert a Simulation Manager federate that a particular event has occurred.

parameter.name: OriginatingEntity
parameter.semantics: The DIS entity ID of the entity or application sending the interaction.

parameter.name: ReceivingEntity
parameter.semantics: The DIS entity ID of the entity or application which is the intended recipient of the interaction.

parameter.name: EventType
parameter.semantics: The type of event being reported.

parameter.name: FixedDatums
parameter.semantics: The set of fixed size data items (types and values) associated with this event.

parameter.name: VariableDatumSet
parameter.semantics: The set of variable size data items (types and values) associated with this event.

interactionClass.name: MinefieldData
interactionClass.semantics: Provides information on individual mines contained within a minefield

parameter.name: GroundBurialDepthOffset
parameter.semantics: Specifies the offset of the origin of the mine coordinate system with respect to the ground surface. This offset can be used in conjunction with the mine orienteation to determine the actual ground burial depth of the surfaces of a mine. Ground burial depth offset is specified as a positive measurement in meteres below the wate surface along the up vector.

parameter.name: Fusing
parameter.semantics: Specifies the primary and secondary fuse and anti-handling device for each mine.

parameter.name: MineEmplacementTime
parameter.semantics: Specifies the real-world, coordinated universal time (UTC) emplacement time of a mine.

parameter.name: MineEntityIdentifier
parameter.semantics: Specifies the mine entity identifier number. The mine identification in conjunction with the MinefieldID form the unique identifier for each mine.

parameter.name: MinefieldIdentifier
parameter.semantics: Identifies the minefield to which the mines belong

parameter.name: MineLocation
parameter.semantics: Specifies the location of the relative to the minfield location.

parameter.name: MineOrientation
parameter.semantics: Specifies the orientation of the center axis direction of fire of the mine, relative to the minefield Coordinate System. If any of the three burial depth offsets is sent in the Record , this field shall also be sent.

parameter.name: MineType
parameter.semantics: Specifies the type of each mine contained within the minefield interaction

parameter.name: NumberOfRecords
parameter.semantics: Specifies the total number of minefiled records being sent in response to a minefield Query interaction.

parameter.name: NumberTripDetonationWires
parameter.semantics: Specifies the number of trip detonation wires that exist for each mine. I sub n designates the trip wire count for mine n of N.

parameter.name: NumberWireVertices
parameter.semantics: Specifies the number of vertices are in each trip wire. A set of I sub n vertex counts is given for each mine n of N, iff I sub n > 0. If I sub n is 0, the vertex count set is empty. Each non empty set of vertex counts (I sub n > 0) follows the previous non empty set. J sub i designates the vertex count of tripwire i of I sub n.

parameter.name: PaintScheme
parameter.semantics: Specifies the camouflage scheme and color of the mine.

parameter.name: RecordSequenceNumber
parameter.semantics: Specifies the number of the current record in a sequence of minefiled records sent in response to a query interaction.

parameter.name: Reflectance
parameter.semantics: Specifies the local dielectric difference between the mine and the surrounding soil.

parameter.name: RequestIdentifier
parameter.semantics: Identifies the matching response to a request for mine information from the minefield simulation made by means of a Query interaction

parameter.name: RequestingEntityIdentifier
parameter.semantics: Identifies the matching response to a request for mine information from the associated minefield object state.

parameter.name: ScalarDetectionCoefficient
parameter.semantics: Specifies the coefficient to be utilized to insure proper correlation between detctors located on different simulation platforms. In statistically based detection system applications, the detection system simulation will generally compare a random number against an internally calculated probability of detection. There are M (number of sensors) coefficients for each of the N mines. Question: all of type 1 first then all of type 2 OR all of mine 1 first then mine 2.

parameter.name: SensorTypes
parameter.semantics: In QRP mode, specifies the requesting sensor types which were specified in the minefield query. In heartbeat mode, specifies the sensor types that are bein served by the minefield.

parameter.name: SnowBurialDepthOffset
parameter.semantics: Specifies the offset of the origin of the mine coordinate system with respect to the snow surface. This offset can be used in conjuncition with the mine orientation to determine the actual snow baurial depth of the survaces of a mine. Snow burial depth offset is specified as a positive measurement in meters below the snow surface along the up vector.

parameter.name: ThermalContrast
parameter.semantics: Specifies the temperature difference between the mine and the surround soil in degrees Centigrade. In the case of a buried mine, the delta temperature shall be measured between the ground surface above the mine and the surrounding ground surface temperature.

parameter.name: WaterBurialDepthOffset
parameter.semantics: Specifies the offset of the origin of the mine coordinate system with respect to the water surface. This offset can be used in conjunction with the mine orienteation to determine the actual water burial depth of the surfaces of a mine. Water burial depth offset is specified as a positive measurement in meteres below the wate surface along the up vector.

parameter.name: WireVertices
parameter.semantics: Specifies the vertices in a trip wire. A set of J sub i vertices is given for each trip wire i of I sub n, iff I sub n is > 0 and J sub i > 0. If I sub n is 0 or J sub i is 0, the vertex set is empty. Each non empty set of verticies (J sub i > 0) follows the previous non empty set.

interactionClass.name: MinefieldQuery
interactionClass.semantics: Provides the means by which a federate shall query a minefield simulation for information on the individual mines within the minefield operating in QRP mode.

parameter.name: MinefieldIdentifier
parameter.semantics: Identifies the minefield to which this query is addressed.

parameter.name: PerimeterPoints
parameter.semantics: Specifie the location of each perimeter point in the requested area relative to the minefield location.

parameter.name: QueryFusing
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not fusing is requested.

parameter.name: QueryMineOrientation
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not orientation is requested.

parameter.name: QueryGroundBurialDepthOffset
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not ground burial depth offset is requested.

parameter.name: QueryMineEmplacementAge
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not emplacement age is requested.

parameter.name: QueryPaintScheme
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not paint scheme is requested.

parameter.name: QueryReflectance
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not reflectance is requested.

parameter.name: QueryScalarDetectionCoefficient
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not scalar detection coefficient is requested.

parameter.name: QuerySnowBurialDepthOffset
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not snow burial depth offset is requested.

parameter.name: QueryThermalContrast
