parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not thermal contrast is requested.

parameter.name: QueryTripDetonationWire
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not trip detonation wire is requested.

parameter.name: QueryWaterBurialDepthOffset
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not water burial depth offset is requested.

parameter.name: RequestingEntityIdentifier
parameter.semantics: Identifies the entity requesting the information from the minefield federate.

parameter.name: RequestIdentifier
parameter.semantics: Identifies the minefield query request.

parameter.name: RequestedMineType
parameter.semantics: Specifies the type of mine being queried by the requesting federate.

parameter.name: SensorTypes
parameter.semantics: Specifies the types of sensors requesting the data.

interactionClass.name: MinefieldResponseNACK
interactionClass.semantics: A response to a MinefieldQuery providing information on individual mines within a minefield.

parameter.name: MinefieldIdentifier
parameter.semantics: Identifies the minefield to which the mines belong

parameter.name: MissingRecordNumbers
parameter.semantics: Identifies the record numbers not recieved in a sequence of minefiled records.

parameter.name: RequestIdentifier
parameter.semantics: Identifies the matching response to a request for mine information from the minefield simulation made by means of a Query interaction

parameter.name: RequestingEntityIdentifier
parameter.semantics: Identifies the matching response to a request for mine information from the associated minefield object state.

interactionClass.name: MunitionDetonation
interactionClass.semantics: Communicates information associated with the impact or detonation of a munition

parameter.name: ArticulatedPartData
parameter.semantics: The set of articulated parts affected by the detonation (including where on the articulated part the detonation has affected).

parameter.name: DetonationLocation
parameter.semantics: The location, in the world coordinate system, of the detonation.

parameter.name: DetonationResultCode
parameter.semantics: The type of detonation (including no detonation).

parameter.name: EventIdentifier
parameter.semantics: An ID, generated by the issuing federate, used to associated related fire and detonation events.

parameter.name: FiringObjectIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The ID of the object firing the munition.

parameter.name: FinalVelocityVector
parameter.semantics: The velocity vector of the munition at the moment of the detonation.

parameter.name: FuseType
parameter.semantics: The type of fuse on the munition.

parameter.name: MunitionObjectIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The ID of the associated munition object (if any).

parameter.name: MunitionType
parameter.semantics: The type of munition that is detonating.

parameter.name: QuantityFired
parameter.semantics: The quantity of rounds fired in a burst.

parameter.name: RateOfFire
parameter.semantics: The rate of fire, in rounds per minute, of the munitions in the burst.

parameter.name: RelativeDetonationLocation
parameter.semantics: The location of the detonation, relative to the target object (if any).

parameter.name: TargetObjectIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The ID of the object that the munition has detonated on.

parameter.name: WarheadType
parameter.semantics: The type of warhead on the munition.

interactionClass.name: RadioSignal
interactionClass.semantics: The wireless transmission and reception of audio or digital data by means of electromagnetic waves.

interactionClass.name: ApplicationSpecificRadioSignal
interactionClass.semantics: A form of radio signal, which uses an application specific encoding scheme.

parameter.name: HostRadioIndex
parameter.semantics: The ID of the radio transmitting this signal.

parameter.name: DataRate
parameter.semantics: The rate at which the data is being transmitted.

parameter.name: SignalDataLength
parameter.semantics: The length of the signal data.

parameter.name: SignalData
parameter.semantics: The signal data.

parameter.name: TacticalDataLinkType
parameter.semantics: The type of tactical data link used to transmitted this signal (if any).

parameter.name: TDLMessageCount
parameter.semantics: The number of tactical data link messages contained in this signal.

parameter.name: UserProtocolID
parameter.semantics: The ID of the user protocol in use.

interactionClass.name: DatabaseIndexRadioSignal
interactionClass.semantics: A form of radio signal, which encodes the signal as an index to a (pre-determined) database.

parameter.name: HostRadioIndex
parameter.semantics: The ID of the radio transmitting this signal.

parameter.name: DatabaseIndex
parameter.semantics: The index into the federation specific database of stored signals.

parameter.name: Duration
parameter.semantics: The duration of the stored signal to be replayed.

parameter.name: StartOffset
parameter.semantics: The offset, from the start of the stored signal, that the signal is replayed from.

parameter.name: TacticalDataLinkType
parameter.semantics: The type of tactical data link used to transmitted this signal (if any).

parameter.name: TDLMessageCount
parameter.semantics: The number of tactical data link messages contained in this signal.

interactionClass.name: EncodedAudioRadioSignal
interactionClass.semantics: A form of radio signal, where the signal is voice/audio data encoded according to a standard encoding scheme.

parameter.name: AudioData
parameter.semantics: The data associated with the encoded audio radio signal

interactionClass.name: RawBinaryRadioSignal
interactionClass.semantics: A form of radio signal, which the signal is not encoded in any way.

parameter.name: HostRadioIndex
parameter.semantics: The ID of the radio transmitting this signal.

parameter.name: DataRate
parameter.semantics: The rate at which the data is being transmitted.

parameter.name: SignalDataLength
parameter.semantics: The length of the signal data.

parameter.name: SignalData
parameter.semantics: The signal data.

parameter.name: TacticalDataLinkType
parameter.semantics: The type of tactical data link used to transmitted this signal (if any).

parameter.name: TDLMessageCount
parameter.semantics: The number of tactical data link messages contained in this signal.

interactionClass.name: RecordR
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Managent (SIMAN) interaction designed to acknowledge receipt of a RecordQueryR or SetRecordR interction from a Simulation Manager federate and to inform the Simulation Manager federate whether the federate has implemented the request.

parameter.name: OriginatingEntity
parameter.semantics: The DIS entity ID of the entity or application sending the interaction.

parameter.name: ReceivingEntity
parameter.semantics: The DIS entity ID of the entity or application which is the intended recipient of the interaction.

parameter.name: RequestIdentifier
parameter.semantics: This field matches this response with the specific RecordQueryR or SetRecordR interaction sent by the simulation manager.

parameter.name: EventType
parameter.semantics: The type of event that caused the RecordR interaction to be issued.

parameter.name: AcknowledgementProtocol
parameter.semantics: The acknowledgement protocol to be used for the transaction

parameter.name: ResponseSerialNumber
parameter.semantics: Used to identify the serial number of the RecordR interaction when more than one interaction is used to report record values.

parameter.name: RecordSetData
parameter.semantics: The set of records containing the information requested

interactionClass.name: RecordQueryR
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Managent (SIMAN) interaction designed to allow a Simulation Manager federate to request data, in record format, from another federate.

parameter.name: OriginatingEntity
parameter.semantics: The DIS entity ID of the entity or application sending the interaction.

parameter.name: ReceivingEntity
parameter.semantics: The DIS entity ID of the entity or application which is the intended recipient of the interaction.

parameter.name: RequestIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The Request ID is a monotonically increasing integer identifier inserted by the Simulation Manager into all Simulation management interactions. It is used as a unique identifier to identify the latest in a series of competing requests and identifying acknowledgements.

parameter.name: TimeInterval
parameter.semantics: The interval between regular updates of the requested data. If this field is zero then the recipient should only issue a single RecordR interaction in response to this interaction.

parameter.name: EventType
parameter.semantics: Specifies the type of event that the receiving entity or application should use to trigger the issue of a RecordR interaction in response to this query. If this is zero, then reporting shall be periodic based upon the value of the TimeInterval parameter.

parameter.name: AcknowledgementProtocol
parameter.semantics: The acknowledgement protocol to be used for the transaction

parameter.name: RecordIdentifiers
parameter.semantics: Identifies the records for which information is requested

interactionClass.name: RemoveEntity
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction, sent from a Simulation Manager to request that a specified entity be removed from the simulation.

parameter.name: OriginatingEntity
parameter.semantics: The DIS entity ID of the entity or application sending the interaction.

parameter.name: ReceivingEntity
parameter.semantics: The DIS entity ID of the entity or application which is the intended recipient of the interaction.

parameter.name: RequestIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The Request ID is a monotonically increasing integer identifier inserted by the Simulation Manager into all Simulation management interactions. It is used as a unique identifier to identify the latest in a series of competing requests and identifying acknowledgements.

interactionClass.name: RemoveEntityR
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction, sent from a Simulation Manager to request that a specified entity be removed from the simulation.

parameter.name: AcknowledgementProtocol
parameter.semantics: The acknowledgement protocol to be used for a transaction

interactionClass.name: RemoveObjectRequest
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction, sent from a Simulation Manager to request that one or more specified objects be removed from the simulation.

parameter.name: ObjectIdentifiers
parameter.semantics: The IDs of the objects to be removed.

parameter.name: RequestIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The Request ID is a monotonically increasing integer identifier inserted by the Simulation Manager into all Simulation management interactions. It is used as a unique identifier to identify the latest in a series of competing requests and identifying acknowledgements.

interactionClass.name: RemoveObjectRequestR
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction, sent from a Simulation Manager to request that one or more specified objects be removed from the simulation.

parameter.name: AcknowledgementProtocol
parameter.semantics: The acknowledgement protocol to be used for a transaction

interactionClass.name: RemoveObjectResult
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction designed to acknowledge receipt of a RemoveObjectRequest interaction, and to inform the Simulation Manager federate whether the removal was successful or not.

parameter.name: RemoveObjectResult
parameter.semantics: The result of the remove object request.

parameter.name: RequestIdentifier
parameter.semantics: This field matches this response with the specific RemoveObject interaction sent by the simulation manager.

interactionClass.name: RemoveObjectResultR
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction designed to acknowledge receipt of a RemoveObjectRequestR interaction, and to inform the Simulation Manager federate whether the removal was successful or not.

interactionClass.name: RepairComplete
interactionClass.semantics: Notifies the requesting entity that the requested repair has been completed.

parameter.name: ReceivingObject
parameter.semantics: Object requesting repairs

parameter.name: RepairingObject
parameter.semantics: Object that is able to perform the requested repair

parameter.name: RepairType
parameter.semantics: Repair performed

interactionClass.name: RepairResponse
interactionClass.semantics: Acknowledges the notification of the completion of a repair.

parameter.name: ReceivingObject
parameter.semantics: Object requesting repairs

parameter.name: RepairingObject
parameter.semantics: Object that is able to perform the requested repair

parameter.name: RepairResultCode
parameter.semantics: Result of repair

interactionClass.name: ResupplyCancel
interactionClass.semantics: Communicates the canceling of a service function by either the receiving or the supplying entity.

parameter.name: ReceivingObject
parameter.semantics: Object that is receiving supplies

parameter.name: SupplyingObject
parameter.semantics: Object that has offered supplies

interactionClass.name: ResupplyOffer
interactionClass.semantics: Communicates the offer of supplies from a supplying entity to a receiving entity.

parameter.name: ReceivingObject
parameter.semantics: Object that the supplies are being offered to.

parameter.name: SupplyingObject
parameter.semantics: Object that is offering the supplies

parameter.name: SuppliesData
parameter.semantics: List of supplies that are offered. If the supplying entity cannot provide the requested supplies, then this parameter shall be omitted.

interactionClass.name: ResupplyReceived
interactionClass.semantics: Acknowledge the receipt of supplies.

parameter.name: ReceivingObject
parameter.semantics: Object that is receiving the supplies

parameter.name: SupplyingObject
parameter.semantics: Object that is providing the supplies.

parameter.name: SuppliesData
parameter.semantics: List of supplies taken by receiving object.

interactionClass.name: ServiceRequest
interactionClass.semantics: A request for logistics support. The requesting entity issues the interaction to the supplying entity asking for repair or specific supplies.

parameter.name: RequestingObject
parameter.semantics: Object requesting service

parameter.name: ServicingObject
parameter.semantics: Object that is able to provide the requested service

parameter.name: ServiceType
parameter.semantics: Type of requested service

parameter.name: SuppliesData
parameter.semantics: For a service of resupply, the list of supplies to be exchanged. If the service requested is not resupply, then this parameter shall be omitted.

interactionClass.name: SetData
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction, sent from a Simulation Manager federate to request that a federate sets the values of specified data to specified values.

parameter.name: OriginatingEntity
parameter.semantics: The DIS entity ID of the entity or application sending the interaction.

parameter.name: ReceivingEntity
parameter.semantics: The DIS entity ID of the entity or application which is the intended recipient of the interaction.

parameter.name: RequestIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The Request ID is a monotonically increasing integer identifier inserted by the Simulation Manager into all Simulation management interactions. It is used as a unique identifier to identify the latest in a series of competing requests and identifying acknowledgements.

parameter.name: FixedDatums
parameter.semantics: The set of fixed length data items (types and values) that the recipient is requested to set.

parameter.name: VariableDatumSet
parameter.semantics: The set of variables length data items (types and values) that the recipient is requested to set.

interactionClass.name: SetDataR
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction, sent from a Simulation Manager federate to request that a federate sets the values of specified data to specified values. The Simulation Manager federate specifies the acknowledgement protocol to be used.

parameter.name: AcknowledgementProtocol
parameter.semantics: The acknowledgement protocol to be used for a transaction

interactionClass.name: SetRecordR
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction, sent from a Simulation Manager federate to request that a federate sets the values of specified data to specified values (provided in record format).

parameter.name: OriginatingEntity
parameter.semantics: The DIS entity ID of the entity or application sending the interaction.

parameter.name: ReceivingEntity
parameter.semantics: The DIS entity ID of the entity or application which is the intended recipient of the interaction.

parameter.name: RequestIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The Request ID is a monotonically increasing integer identifier inserted by the Simulation Manager into all Simulation management interactions. It is used as a unique identifier to identify the latest in a series of competing requests and identifying acknowledgements.

parameter.name: AcknowledgementProtocol
parameter.semantics: The acknowledgement protocol to be used for a transaction

parameter.name: RecordSetData
parameter.semantics: Specifies the information, in record format, to be set by the receiving entity.

interactionClass.name: StartResume
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction, sent from a Simulation Manager federate to either a) start simulating one or more entities or b) resume simulation of one or more entities after a pause.

parameter.name: OriginatingEntity
parameter.semantics: The DIS entity ID of the entity or application sending the interaction.

parameter.name: ReceivingEntity
parameter.semantics: The DIS entity ID of the entity or application which is the intended recipient of the interaction.

parameter.name: RealWorldTime
parameter.semantics: The real world time that the entity or entities should start/resumed.

parameter.name: RequestIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The Request ID is a monotonically increasing integer identifier inserted by the Simulation Manager into all Simulation management interactions. It is used as a unique identifier to identify the latest in a series of competing requests and identifying acknowledgements.

parameter.name: SimulationTime
parameter.semantics: The simulation time that the entity or entities should use when they start/resume.

interactionClass.name: StartResumeR
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction, sent from a Simulation Manager federate to either a) start simulating one or more entities or b) resume simulation of one or more entities after a pause. The Simulation Manager federate specifies the acknowledgement protocol to be used.

parameter.name: AcknowledgementProtocol
parameter.semantics: The acknowledgement protocol to be used for a transaction

interactionClass.name: StopFreeze
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction, sent from a Simulation Manager federate to request that one or more entities either a) pause their simulation or b) stop their simulation.

parameter.name: OriginatingEntity
parameter.semantics: The DIS entity ID of the entity or application sending the interaction.

parameter.name: ReceivingEntity
parameter.semantics: The DIS entity ID of the entity or application which is the intended recipient of the interaction.

parameter.name: RequestIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The Request ID is a monotonically increasing integer identifier inserted by the Simulation Manager into all Simulation management interactions. It is used as a unique identifier to identify the latest in a series of competing requests and identifying acknowledgements.

parameter.name: RealWorldTime
parameter.semantics: The real world time that the entity or entities should stop/freeze.

parameter.name: Reason
parameter.semantics: The reason for the stop or freeze.

parameter.name: ReflectValues
parameter.semantics: Whether the entity or entities being stopped/frozen should continue to reflect values when stopped/frozen.

parameter.name: RunInternalSimulationClock
parameter.semantics: Whether the entity or entities being stopped/frozen should continue to run their internal simulation clock when stopped/frozen.

parameter.name: UpdateAttributes
parameter.semantics: Whether the entity or entities being stopped/frozen should continue to update attributes when stopped/frozen.

interactionClass.name: StopFreezeR
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction, sent from a Simulation Manager federate to request that one or more entities either a) pause their simulation or b) stop their simulation. The Simulation Manager federate specifies the acknowledgement protocol to be used.

parameter.name: AcknowledgementProtocol
parameter.semantics: The acknowledgement protocol to be used for a transaction

interactionClass.name: WeaponFire
interactionClass.semantics: Communicates information associated with the firing or launch of a munition.

parameter.name: EventIdentifier
parameter.semantics: An ID, generated by the issuing federate, used to associated related fire and detonation events.

parameter.name: FireControlSolutionRange
parameter.semantics: The range used in the fire control solution. Zero if the range is unknown or inapplicable.

parameter.name: FireMissionIndex
parameter.semantics: A unique index to identify the fire mission (used to associated weapon fire interactions in a single fire mission).

parameter.name: FiringLocation
parameter.semantics: The location, the world coordinate system, of the weapon fire.

parameter.name: FiringObjectIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The ID of the object ffiring the munition.

parameter.name: FuseType
parameter.semantics: The type of fuse on the munition.

parameter.name: InitialVelocityVector
parameter.semantics: The velocity vector of the munition when fired.

parameter.name: MunitionObjectIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The ID of the associated munition object (if any).

parameter.name: MunitionType
parameter.semantics: The type of munition being fired.

parameter.name: QuantityFired
parameter.semantics: The number of rounds fired in the fire event.

parameter.name: RateOfFire
parameter.semantics: The rate of fire at which the munitions in the burst described in the fire event.

parameter.name: TargetObjectIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The ID of the object being fired at (if any).

parameter.name: WarheadType
parameter.semantics: The type of warhead fitted to the munition being fired.

interactionClass.name: TransferControl
interactionClass.semantics: A Simulation Management (SIMAN) interaction, sent to initiate the transfer of control of an entity.

parameter.name: OriginatingEntity
parameter.semantics: The DIS entity ID of the entity or application sending the interaction.

parameter.name: ReceivingEntity
parameter.semantics: The DIS entity ID of the entity or application which is the intended recipient of the interaction.

parameter.name: RequestIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The Request ID is a monotonically increasing integer identifier inserted by the Simulation Manager into all Simulation management interactions. It is used as a unique identifier to identify the latest in a series of competing requests and identifying acknowledgements.

parameter.name: TransferType
parameter.semantics: The type of transfer to be performed.

parameter.name: TransferEntity
parameter.semantics: The ID of the object to be transferred.

parameter.name: RecordSetData
parameter.semantics: Specifies the information, in record format, to be set by the receiving entity.

interactionClass.name: HLAmanager
interactionClass.semantics: Root class of MOM interactions

interactionClass.name: HLAfederate
interactionClass.semantics: Root class of MOM interactions that deal with a specific joined federate

parameter.name: HLAfederate
parameter.semantics: Handle of the joined federate that was provided when joining.

interactionClass.name: HLAadjust
interactionClass.semantics: Permit a joined federate to adjust the RTI state variables associated with another joined federate

interactionClass.name: HLAsetTiming
interactionClass.semantics: Adjust the time period between updates of the HLAmanager.HLAfederate object instance for the specified RTI shall not perform periodic updates

parameter.name: HLAreportPeriod
parameter.semantics: Number of seconds between updates of instance (A zero value causes periodic updates to cease)

interactionClass.name: HLAmodifyAttributeState
interactionClass.semantics: Modify the ownership state of an attribute of an object instance for the specified joined federate. If the interaction is used to give ownership of the instance attribute to the specified joined federate and another joined federate currently owns the instance attribute, the owning joined federate shall be divested of ownership of the instance attribute before ownership is granted to the specified joined federate. No notification of change of ownership of the instance attribute shall be provided to either joined federate. In order for ownership of the instance attribute to be granted to the specified joined federate, the following conditions shall be true: - the specified joined federate knows about the object instance - the specified joined federate is publishing the corresponding class attribute at the known class of the specified object instance at that joined federate - the specified instance attribute is not owned by the RTI (i.e., it's not a predefined attribute of a MOM object class) If one or more of the above conditions are not met, then the interaction shall have no effect and an error shall be reported via an interaction of class HLAmanager. HLAfederate.HLAreport.HLAreportMOMexception.

parameter.name: HLAobjectInstance
parameter.semantics: Handle of the object instance whose attribute state is being changed

parameter.name: HLAattribute
parameter.semantics: Handle of the instance attribute whose state is being changed

parameter.name: HLAattributeState
parameter.semantics: New state for the attribute of the object instance

interactionClass.name: HLAsetServiceReporting
interactionClass.semantics: Specify whether to report service invocations to or from the specified joined federate via HLAmanager.HLAfederate. HLAreport.HLAreportServiceInvocation interactions (enable or disable service reporting). If the specified joined federate is subscribed to the HLAmanager.HLAfederate.HLAreport. HLAreportServiceInvocation interaction, all attempts to enable service reporting for that joined federate by sending an HLAmanager.HLAfederate.HLAadjust. HLAsetServiceReporting interaction with an HLAreportingState parameter value of HLAtrue shall fail and be reported via the normal MOM interaction failure means

parameter.name: HLAreportingState
parameter.semantics: Whether the RTI should report service invocations (default = HLAfalse)

interactionClass.name: HLAsetExceptionReporting
interactionClass.semantics: Specify whether the RTI shall report service invocation exceptions via HLAmanager.HLAfederate.HLAreport. HLAreportException interactions

parameter.name: HLAreportingState
parameter.semantics: Whether the RTI should report exceptions (default = HLAfalse)

interactionClass.name: HLAsetSwitches
interactionClass.semantics: Set the values of HLA switches.

parameter.name: HLAconveyRegionDesignatorSets
parameter.semantics: Set the federate-specific Convey Region Designator Sets Switch to the provided value (this parameter is required only when a change of this switch value is needed).

interactionClass.name: HLArequest
interactionClass.semantics: Permit a federate to request RTI data about another federate

interactionClass.name: HLArequestPublications
interactionClass.semantics: Request that the RTI send report interactions that contain the publication data of a joined federate. It shall result in one interaction of class HLAmanager. HLAfederate.HLAreport.HLAreportInteractionPublication and one interaction of class HLAmanager.HLAfederate. HLAreport.HLAreportObjectClassPublication for each object class published

interactionClass.name: HLArequestSubscriptions
interactionClass.semantics: Request that the RTI send report interactions that contain the subscription data of a joined federate. It shall result in one interaction of class HLAmanager. HLAfederate.HLAreport. HLAreportInteractionSubscription and one interaction of class HLAmanager.HLAfederate. HLAreport.HLAreportObjectClassSubscription for each object class published

interactionClass.name: HLArequestObjectInstancesThatCanBeDeleted
interactionClass.semantics: Request that the RTI send a report interaction that contains the object instances that can be deleted at the joined federate. It shall result in one interaction of class HLAmanager.HLAfederate.HLAreport. HLAreportObjectInstancesThatCanBeDeleted

interactionClass.name: HLArequestObjectInstancesUpdated
interactionClass.semantics: Request that the RTI send a report interaction that contains the object instance updating responsibility of a joined federate. It shall result in one interaction of class HLAmanager.HLAfederate.HLAreport. HLAreportObjectInstancesUpdated

interactionClass.name: HLArequestObjectInstancesReflected
interactionClass.semantics: Request that the RTI send a report interaction that contains the objects instances for which a joined federate has had a Reflect Attribute Values service invocation. It shall result in one interaction of class HLAmanager.HLAfederate.HLAreport. HLAreportObjectInstancesReflected

interactionClass.name: HLArequestUpdatesSent
interactionClass.semantics: Request that the RTI send a report interaction that contains the number of updates that a joined federate has generated. It shall result in one interaction of class HLAmanager.HLAfederate.HLAreport.HLAreportUpdatesSent for each transportation type that is used to send updates

interactionClass.name: HLArequestInteractionsSent
interactionClass.semantics: Request that the RTI send a report interaction that contains the number of interactions that a joined federate has generated. This count shall include interactions sent with region. It shall result in one interaction of class HLAmanager.HLAfederate.HLAreport. HLAreportInteractionsSent for each transportation type that is used to send interactions

interactionClass.name: HLArequestReflectionsReceived
interactionClass.semantics: Request that the RTI send a report interaction that contains the number of reflections that a joined federate has received. It shall result in one interaction of class HLAmanager.HLAfederate.HLAreport. HLAreportReflectionsReceived for each transportation type used in receiving reflections

interactionClass.name: HLArequestInteractionsReceived
interactionClass.semantics: Request that the RTI send a report interaction that contains the number of interactions that a joined federate has received. It shall result in one interaction of class HLAmanager.HLAfederate.HLAreport. HLAreportInteractionsReceived for each transportation typeused in receiving interactions

interactionClass.name: HLArequestObjectInstanceInformation
interactionClass.semantics: Request that the RTI send a report interaction that contains the information that a joined federate maintains on a single object instance. It shall result in one interaction of class HLAmanager.HLAfederate.HLAreport. HLAreportObjectInstanceInformation

parameter.name: HLAobjectInstance
parameter.semantics: Handle of the object instance for which information is being requested

interactionClass.name: HLArequestSynchronizationPoints
interactionClass.semantics: Request that the RTI send a report interaction that contains a list of all in-progress federation synchronization points. It shall result in one interaction class HLAmanager.HLAfederate.HLAreport. HLAreportSynchronizationPoints

interactionClass.name: HLArequestSynchronizationPointStatus
interactionClass.semantics: Request that the RTI send a report interaction that contains a list that includes each federate (and its synchronization point status) that is associated with a particular synchronization point. It shall result in one inteaction of class HLAmanager.HLAfederate.HLAreport. HLAreportSynchronizationPointStaus

interactionClass.name: HLAreport
interactionClass.semantics: Report RTI data about a joined federate. The RTI shall send these interactions in response to interactions of class HLAmanager.HLAfederate.HLArequest.

interactionClass.name: HLAreportObjectClassPublication
interactionClass.semantics: The interaction shall be sent by the RTI in response to an interaction of class HLAmanager.HLAfederate. HLArequest.HLArequestPublications. It shall report the attributes of one object class published by the joined federate. One of these interactions shall be sent for each object class containing attributes that are published by the joined federate

parameter.name: HLAnumberOfClasses
parameter.semantics: The number of object classes for which the joined federate publishes attributes

parameter.name: HLAobjectClass
parameter.semantics: The object class whose publication is being reported

parameter.name: HLAattributeList
parameter.semantics: List of handles of HLAobjectClass attributes that the joined federate is publishing

interactionClass.name: HLAreportObjectClassSubscription
interactionClass.semantics: The interaction shall be sent by the RTI in response to an interaction of class HLAmanager.HLAfederate. HLArequest.HLArequestSubscriptions. It shall report the attributes of one object class subscribed to by the joined federate. One of these interactions shall be sent for each object class that is subscribed to by the joined federate. This information shall reflect related DDM usage.

parameter.name: HLAnumberOfClasses
parameter.semantics: The number of object classes for which the joined federate subscribes to attributes. This information shall reflect related DDM usage.

parameter.name: HLAobjectClass
parameter.semantics: The object class whose subscription is being reported

parameter.name: HLAactive
parameter.semantics: Whether the subscription is active

parameter.name: HLAattributeList
parameter.semantics: List of handles of class attributes to which the joined federate is subscribing.

interactionClass.name: HLAreportInteractionPublication
interactionClass.semantics: The interaction shall be sent by the RTI in response to an interaction of class HLAmanager.HLAfederate. HLArequest.HLArequestPublications. It shall report the interaction classes published by the joined federate

parameter.name: HLAinteractionClassList
parameter.semantics: List of interaction classes that the joined federate is publishing

interactionClass.name: HLAreportInteractionSubscription
interactionClass.semantics: The interaction shall be sent by the RTI in response to an interaction of class HLAmanager.HLAfederate. HLArequest.HLArequestSubscriptions. It shall report the interaction classes subscribed to by the joined federate. This information shall reflect related DDM usage.

parameter.name: HLAinteractionClassList
parameter.semantics: List of interaction class/subscription type pairs. Each pair consists of the handle of an interaction class that the joined federate is subscribed to and whether the joined federate is actively subscribing. This information shall reflect related DDM usage.

interactionClass.name: HLAreportObjectInstancesThatCanBeDeleted
interactionClass.semantics: The interaction shall be sent by the RTI in response to an interaction of class HLAmanager.HLAfederate. HLArequest.HLArequestObjectInstancesThatCanBeDeleted. It shall report the number of object instances (by registered class of the object instances) whose HLAprivilegeToDeleteObject attribute areowned by the joined federate.

parameter.name: HLAobjectInstanceCounts
parameter.semantics: A list of object instance counts. Each object instance count consists of an object class handle and the number of object instances of that class

interactionClass.name: HLAreportObjectInstancesUpdated
interactionClass.semantics: The interaction shall be sent by the RTI in response to an interaction of class HLAmanager.HLAfederate. HLArequest.HLArequestObjectInstancessUpdated. It shall report the number of object instances (by registered class of the object instances) for which the joined federate has invoked the Update Attribute Values service.

parameter.name: HLAobjectInstanceCounts
parameter.semantics: List of object instance counts. Each object instance count consists of an object class handle and the number of object instances of that class.

interactionClass.name: HLAreportObjectInstancesReflected
interactionClass.semantics: The interaction shall be sent by the RTI in response to an interaction of class HLAmanager.HLAfederate. HLArequest.HLArequestObjectInstancessReflected. It shall report the number of object instances (by registered class of the object instances) for which the joined federate has had a Reflect Attribute Values service invocation.

parameter.name: HLAobjectInstanceCounts
parameter.semantics: List of object instance counts. Each object instance count consists of an object class handle and the number of object instances of that class.

interactionClass.name: HLAreportUpdatesSent
interactionClass.semantics: The interaction shall be sent by the RTI in response to an interaction of class HLAmanager.HLAfederate. HLArequest.HLArequestUpdatesSent. It shall report the number of updates sent (by registered class of the object instances of the updates) by the joined federate since the beginning of the federation execution. One interaction of this class shall be sent by the RTI for each transportation type used.

parameter.name: HLAtransportation
parameter.semantics: Transportation type used in sending updates

parameter.name: HLAupdateCounts
parameter.semantics: List of update counts. Each update count consists of an object class handle and the number of updates sent of that class

interactionClass.name: HLAreportReflectionsReceived
interactionClass.semantics: The interaction shall be sent by the RTI in response to an interaction of class HLAmanager.HLAfederate. HLArequest.HLArequestReflectionsReceived. It shall report the number of reflections received (by registered class of the object instances of the reflects) by the joined federate since the beginning of the federation execution. One interaction of this class shall be sent by the RTI for each transportation type used.

parameter.name: HLAtransportation
parameter.semantics: Transportation type used in receiving reflections

parameter.name: HLAreflectCounts
parameter.semantics: List of reflection counts. Each reflection count consists of an object class handle and the number of reflections received of that class.

interactionClass.name: HLAreportInteractionsSent
interactionClass.semantics: The interaction shall be sent by the RTI in response to an interaction of class HLAmanager.HLAfederate. HLArequest.HLArequestInteractionsSent. It shall report the number of interactions sent (by sent class of the interactions) by the joined federate since the beginning of the federation execution. This count shall include interactions sent with region. One interaction of this class shall be sent by the RTI for each transportation type used.

parameter.name: HLAtransportation
parameter.semantics: Transportation type used in sending interactions

parameter.name: HLAinteractionCounts
parameter.semantics: List of interaction counts. Each interaction count consists of an interaction class handle and the number of interactions of that class. This information shall reflect related DDM usage.

interactionClass.name: HLAreportInteractionsReceived
interactionClass.semantics: The interaction shall be sent by the RTI in response to an interaction of class HLAmanager.HLAfederate. HLArequest. HLArequestInteractionsReceived. It shall report the number of interactions received (by sent class of the interactions) by the joined federate since the beginning of the federation execution. One interaction of this class shall be sent by the RTI for each transportation type used.

parameter.name: HLAtransportation
parameter.semantics: Transportation type used in receiving interactions

parameter.name: HLAinteractionCounts
parameter.semantics: List of interaction counts. Each interaction count consists of an interaction class handle and the number of interactions of that class.

interactionClass.name: HLAreportObjectInstanceInformation
interactionClass.semantics: The interaction shall be sent by the RTI in response to an interaction of class HLAmanager.HLAfederate. HLArequest.HLArequestObjectInstance Information. It shall report on a single object instance and portray the attributes of that object instance that are owned by the joined federate, the registered class of the object instance, and the known class of the object instance at the joined federate.

parameter.name: HLAobjectInstance
parameter.semantics: Handle of the object instance for which the interaction was sent

parameter.name: HLAownedInstanceAttributeList
parameter.semantics: List of the handles of all instance attributes, of the object instance, owned by the joined federate

parameter.name: HLAregisteredClass
parameter.semantics: Handle of the registered class of the object instance

parameter.name: HLAknownClass
parameter.semantics: Handle of the known class of the object instance at the joined federate

interactionClass.name: HLAreportException
interactionClass.semantics: The interaction shall be sent by the RTI when an exception occurs as the result of a service invocation at the indicated joined federate. This interaction shall be sent only if the last HLAmanager.HLAfederate.HLAadjust. HLAsetExceptionReporting interaction changing the HLAreportingState parameter sets the parameter to HLAtrue, for the indicated joined federate.

parameter.name: HLAservice
parameter.semantics: Name of the service that raised the exception

parameter.name: HLAexception
parameter.semantics: Textual depiction of the exception

interactionClass.name: HLAreportServiceInvocation
interactionClass.semantics: This interaction shall be sent by the RTI whenever an HLA service is invoked, either by the indicated joined federate or by the RTI at the indicated joined federate, and Service Reporting is Enabled for the indicated joined federate. This interaction shall always contain the arguments supplied by the service invoker. If the service invocation was successful, the interaction also shall contain the value returned to the invoker (if the service returns a value); otherwise, the interaction also shall contain an indication of the exception that shall be raised to the invoker.

parameter.name: HLAservice
parameter.semantics: Textual name of the service

parameter.name: HLAsuccessIndicator
parameter.semantics: Whether the service invocation was successful. Exception values are returned along with a HLAfalse value

parameter.name: HLAsuppliedArguments
parameter.semantics: Textual depiction of the arguments supplied in the service invocation

parameter.name: HLAreturnedArguments
parameter.semantics: Textual depiction of the argument returned by the service invocation (null if the service does not normally return a value or if HLAsuccessIndicator is HLAfalse)

parameter.name: HLAexception
parameter.semantics: Textual depiction of the exception raised by this service invocation (null if HLAsuccessIndicator is HLAtrue)

parameter.name: HLAserialNumber
parameter.semantics: This is a per-joined federate serial number that shall start at zero and shall increment by 1 for each HLAmanager.HLAfederate.HLAreport HLAreportServiceInvocation interaction that represents service invocations to or from the respective joined federate.

interactionClass.name: HLAreportMOMexception
interactionClass.semantics: The interaction shall be sent by the RTI when one the following occurs: - a MOM interaction without all the necessary parameters is sent or - an interaction that imitates a federate's invocation of an RTI service is sent and not all of the service's pre-conditions are met.

parameter.name: HLAservice
parameter.semantics: Name of the service interaction that had a problem or raised the exception

parameter.name: HLAexception
parameter.semantics: Textual depiction of the problem or exception

parameter.name: HLAparameterError
parameter.semantics: HLAtrue if there was an incorrect number of interaction parameters, HLAfalse otherwise

interactionClass.name: HLAreportSynchronizationPoints
interactionClass.semantics: The interaction shall be sent by the RTI in response to an interaction of class HLAmanager.HLAfederate. HLArequest.HLArequestSynchronizationPoints. It shall report the list of active synchronization points in the federation execution.

parameter.name: HLAsyncPoints
parameter.semantics: List of the in progress federation execution synchronization points

interactionClass.name: HLAreportSynchronizationPointStatus
interactionClass.semantics: The interaction shall be sent by the RTI in response to particular synchronization point.

parameter.name: HLAsyncPointName
parameter.semantics: Name of a particular synchronization point

parameter.name: HLAsyncPointFederates
parameter.semantics: List of each federate (and its synchronization status) associated with the particular synchronization point

interactionClass.name: HLAservice
interactionClass.semantics: The interaction class shall be acted upon by the RTI. These interactions shall invoke HLA services on behalf of another joined federate. They shall cause the RTI to react as if the care.

interactionClass.name: HLAresignFederationExecution
interactionClass.semantics: Cause the joined federate to resign from the federation execution. A joined federate shall be able to send this interaction anytime.

parameter.name: HLAresignAction
parameter.semantics: Action that the RTI is to take in conjunction with the resignation

interactionClass.name: HLAsynchronizationPointAchieved
interactionClass.semantics: Mimic the federate's report of achieving a synchronization point.

parameter.name: HLAlabel
parameter.semantics: Label associated with the synchronization point

interactionClass.name: HLAfederateSaveBegun
interactionClass.semantics: Mimic the federate's report of starting a save

interactionClass.name: HLAfederateSaveComplete
interactionClass.semantics: Mimic the joined federate's report of completion of a save. A joined federate shall be able to send this interaction during a federation save.

parameter.name: HLAsuccessIndicator
parameter.semantics: Whether the save was successful

interactionClass.name: HLAfederateRestoreComplete
interactionClass.semantics: Mimic the joined federate's report of completion of a restore. A joined federate shall be able to send this interaction during a federation restore.

parameter.name: HLAsuccessIndicator
parameter.semantics: Whether the restore was successful

interactionClass.name: HLApublishObjectClassAttributes
interactionClass.semantics: Set the joined federate's publication status of attributes belonging to an object class

parameter.name: HLAobjectClass
parameter.semantics: Object class for which the joined federate's publication shall change

parameter.name: HLAattributeList
parameter.semantics: List of handles of attributes of HLAobjectClass, which the federate shall now publish

interactionClass.name: HLAunpublishObjectClassAttributes
interactionClass.semantics: Cause the joined federate no longer to publish attributes of an object class

parameter.name: HLAobjectClass
parameter.semantics: Object class for which the joined federate's unpublication shall change

parameter.name: HLAattributeList
parameter.semantics: List of handles of attributes of HLAobjectClass, which the joined federate shall now unpublish

interactionClass.name: HLApublishInteractionClass
interactionClass.semantics: Set the joined federate's publication status of an interaction class

parameter.name: HLAinteractionClass
parameter.semantics: Interaction class that the joined federate shall publish

interactionClass.name: HLAunpublishInteractionClass
interactionClass.semantics: Cause the joined federate no longer to publish an interaction class

parameter.name: HLAinteractionClass
parameter.semantics: Interaction class that the joined federate shall no longer publish

interactionClass.name: HLAsubscribeObjectClassAttributes
interactionClass.semantics: Set the joined federate's subscription status of attributes belonging to an object class

parameter.name: HLAobjectClass
parameter.semantics: Object class for which the joined federate's subscription shall change

parameter.name: HLAattributeList
parameter.semantics: List of handles of attributes of HLAobjectClass to which the joined federate shall now subscribe

parameter.name: HLAactive
parameter.semantics: Whether the subscription is active

interactionClass.name: HLAunsubscribeObjectClassAttributes
interactionClass.semantics: Cause the joined federate no longer to subscribe to attributes of an object class

parameter.name: HLAobjectClass
parameter.semantics: Object class for which the joined federate's subscription shall change

parameter.name: HLAattributeList
parameter.semantics: List of handles of attributes of HLAobjectClass to which the joined federate shall now unsubscribe

interactionClass.name: HLAsubscribeInteractionClass
interactionClass.semantics: Set the joined federate's subscription status to an interaction class.

parameter.name: HLAinteractionClass
parameter.semantics: Interaction class to which the federate shall subscribe

parameter.name: HLAactive
parameter.semantics: Whether the subscription is active

interactionClass.name: HLAunsubscribeInteractionClass
interactionClass.semantics: Cause the joined federate no longer to subscribe to an interaction class

parameter.name: HLAinteractionClass
parameter.semantics: Interaction class to which the joined federate will no longer be subscribed

interactionClass.name: HLAdeleteObjectInstance
interactionClass.semantics: Cause an object instance to be deleted from the federation.

parameter.name: HLAobjectInstance
parameter.semantics: Handle of the object instance that is to be deleted

parameter.name: HLAtag
parameter.semantics: Tag associated with the deletion

parameter.name: HLAtimeStamp
parameter.semantics: Time stamp of the deletion (optional)

interactionClass.name: HLAlocalDeleteObjectInstance
interactionClass.semantics: Inform the RTI that it shall treat the specified object instance as if thejoined federate did not know about the object instance.

parameter.name: HLAobjectInstance
parameter.semantics: Handle of the object instance that is to be deleted

interactionClass.name: HLAchangeAttributeTransportationType
interactionClass.semantics: Change the transportation type used by the joined federate when sending attributes belonging to the object instance

parameter.name: HLAobjectInstance
parameter.semantics: Handle of the object instance whose attribute transportation type is to be changed

parameter.name: HLAattributeList
parameter.semantics: List of the handles of instance attributes whose transportation type is to be changed

parameter.name: HLAtransportation
parameter.semantics: Transportation type to be used for updating instance attributes in the list

interactionClass.name: HLAchangeInteractionTransportationType
interactionClass.semantics: Change the transportation type used by the joined federate when sending a class of interaction

parameter.name: HLAinteractionClass
parameter.semantics: Interaction class whose transportation type is changed by this service invocation

parameter.name: HLAtransportation
parameter.semantics: Transportation type to be used for sending the interaction class

interactionClass.name: HLAunconditionalAttributeOwnershipDivestiture
interactionClass.semantics: Cause the ownership of attributes of an object instance to be unconditionally divested by the joined federate

parameter.name: HLAobjectInstance
parameter.semantics: Handle of the object instance whose attributes' ownership is to be divested

parameter.name: HLAattributeList
parameter.semantics: List of handles of instance attributes belonging to HLAobjectInstance whose ownership is to be divested by the joined federate

interactionClass.name: HLAenableTimeRegulation
interactionClass.semantics: Cause the joined federate to begin regulating the logical time of other joined federates

parameter.name: HLAlookahead
parameter.semantics: Lookahead to be used by the joined federate while regulating other joined federates

interactionClass.name: HLAdisableTimeRegulation
interactionClass.semantics: Cause the joined federate to cease regulating the logical time of other joined federates

interactionClass.name: HLAenableTimeConstrained
interactionClass.semantics: Cause the logical time of the joined federate to begin being constrained by the logical times of other joined federates

interactionClass.name: HLAdisableTimeConstrained
interactionClass.semantics: Cause the logical time of the joined federate to cease being constrained by the logical times of other joined federates

interactionClass.name: HLAtimeAdvanceRequest
interactionClass.semantics: Request an advance of the joined federate's logical time on behalf of the joined federate, and release zero or more messages for delivery to the joined federate

parameter.name: HLAtimeStamp
parameter.semantics: Time stamp requested

interactionClass.name: HLAtimeAdvanceRequestAvailable
interactionClass.semantics: Request an advance of the joined federate's logical time, on behalf of the joined federate, and release zero or more messages for delivery to the joined federate

parameter.name: HLAtimeStamp
parameter.semantics: Time stamp requested

interactionClass.name: HLAnextMessageRequest
interactionClass.semantics: Request the logical time of the joined federate to be advanced to the time stamp of the next TSO message that shall be delivered to the joined federate, provided that the message shall have a time stamp no greater than the logical time specified in the request, and release zero or more messages for delivery to the joined federate.

parameter.name: HLAtimeStamp
parameter.semantics: Time stamp requested

interactionClass.name: HLAnextMessageRequestAvailable
interactionClass.semantics: Request the logical time of the joined federate to be advanced to the time stamp of the next TSO message that shall be delivered to the joined federate, provided that the message shall have a time stamp no greater than the logical time specified in the request, and release zero or more messages for delivery to the joined federate.

parameter.name: HLAtimeStamp
parameter.semantics: Time stamp requested

interactionClass.name: HLAflushQueueRequest
interactionClass.semantics: Request the logical time of the joined federate to be advanced as far as possible, provided that the time stamp is less than or equal to the logical time specified in the request. All TSO and RO messages shall be delivered to the joined federate.

parameter.name: HLAtimeStamp
parameter.semantics: Time stamp requested

interactionClass.name: HLAenableAsynchronousDelivery
interactionClass.semantics: Cause the RTI to deliver receive-order messages to the joined federate at any time, even if the joined federate is time-constrained.

interactionClass.name: HLAdisableAsynchronousDelivery
interactionClass.semantics: When the joined federate is time-constrained, cause the RTI to deliver receive-order messages to the joined federate only when its time manager state is Time Advancing.

interactionClass.name: HLAmodifyLookahead
interactionClass.semantics: Change the lookahead value used by the joined federate

parameter.name: HLAlookahead
parameter.semantics: New value for lookahead

interactionClass.name: HLAchangeAttributeOrderType
interactionClass.semantics: Change the ordering type used by the joined federate when sending attributes belonging to the object instance

parameter.name: HLAobjectInstance
parameter.semantics: Handle of the object instance whose attribute order type is to be changed

parameter.name: HLAattributeList
parameter.semantics: List of the handles of instance attributes whose order type is to be changed

parameter.name: HLAsendOrder
parameter.semantics: Order type to be used for sending the instance attribute list

interactionClass.name: HLAchangeInteractionOrderType
interactionClass.semantics: Change the order type used by the joined federate when sending a class of interaction

parameter.name: HLAinteractionClass
parameter.semantics: Interaction class whose order type is changed by this service invocation

parameter.name: HLAsendOrder
parameter.semantics: Order type to be used for sending the interaction class

interactionClass.name: HLAfederation
interactionClass.semantics: Root class of MOM interactions that deal with a specific federation execution.

interactionClass.name: HLAadjust
interactionClass.semantics: Permit a federate to adjust the RTI state variables associated with a federation execution.

interactionClass.name: HLAsetSwitches
interactionClass.semantics: Set the values of HLA switches.

parameter.name: HLAautoProvide
parameter.semantics: Set the federation-wide Auto Provide Switch to the provided value (this parameter is required only when a change of this switch value is needed).

transportation.name: HLAbestEffort
transportation.description: Make an effort to deliver data in the sense that UDP provides best-effort delivery

transportation.name: HLAreliable
transportation.description: Provide reliable delivery of data in the sense that TCP/IP delivers its data reliably

basicData.name: HLAoctetPairBE
basicData.encoding: Assumed to be portable among hardware devices.

basicData.name: HLAoctetPairLE
basicData.encoding: Assumed to be portable among hardware devices.

basicData.name: HLAfloat32BE
basicData.encoding: 32-bit IEEE normalized single-precision format. See IEEE Std 754-1985

basicData.name: HLAfloat64BE
basicData.encoding: 64-bit IEEE normalized double-precision format. See IEEE Std 754-1985

basicData.name: HLAinteger16BE
basicData.encoding: 16-bit two's complement signed integer. The most significant bit contains the sign.

basicData.name: HLAinteger32BE
basicData.encoding: 32-bit two's complement signed integer. The most significant bit contains the sign.

basicData.name: HLAinteger64BE
basicData.encoding: 64-bit two's complement signed integer first. The most significant bit contains the sign.

basicData.name: HLAoctet
basicData.encoding: Assumed to be portable among hardware devices.

basicData.name: OMT13any
basicData.encoding: An uninterpreted value of any size

basicData.name: HLAinteger16LE
basicData.encoding: 16-bit two's complement signed integer. The most significant bit contains the sign.

basicData.name: HLAinteger32LE
basicData.encoding: 32-bit two's complement signed integer. The most significant bit contains the sign.

basicData.name: HLAinteger64LE
basicData.encoding: 64-bit two's complement signed integer first. The most significant bit contains the sign.

basicData.name: HLAfloat32LE
basicData.encoding: 32-bit IEEE normalized single-precision format. See IEEE Std 754-1985

basicData.name: HLAfloat64LE
basicData.encoding: 64-bit IEEE normalized double-precision format. See IEEE Std 754-1985

simpleData.name: HLAASCIIchar

simpleData.name: HLAunicodeChar
simpleData.semantics: Unicode UTF-16 character (see The Unicode Standard, Version 3.0)

simpleData.name: HLAfederateHandle
simpleData.semantics: The type of the argument to Normalize Federate Handle service. This is a pointer to an RTI-defined programming language object, not an integer 32

enumeratedData.name: OMT13boolean
enumeratedData.semantics: Standard boolean type used for 8-bit compatibility

arrayData.name: OMTbitArray
arrayData.semantics: Uninterpreted sequence of bytes, with a 32-bit length field in bits.

arrayData.name: OMT13string
arrayData.semantics: A null terminated string with no length field.

field.name: HostEntityIdentifier

field.name: HostRTIObjectIdentifier

field.name: NamedLocation

field.name: MarkingEncodingType

field.name: MarkingData

field.name: NumberOfObjectIDs

field.semantics: Acceleration component along the X axis

field.name: YAcceleration
field.semantics: Acceleration component along the Y axis

field.name: ZAcceleration

field.name: SpreadSpectrumType_A_Alternatives
field.semantics: Identifies the actual spread specturm technique in use

field.name: XComponent
field.semantics: Component along the X axis

field.name: YComponent
field.semantics: Component along the Y axis

field.name: ZComponent
field.semantics: Component along the Z axis

field.name: StreamTag
field.semantics: Identifier for the audio stream. This must be globally unique.

field.name: EncodingType
field.semantics: The type of encoding used for the audio data

field.name: SampleRate
field.semantics: The number of samples per second in the signal data.

field.name: DataLength
field.semantics: The length of the signal data.

field.name: SampleCount_A_Data
field.semantics: The signal data.

field.name: Hours
field.semantics: The number of hours since 0000 hours, January 1, 1970 UTC.

field.name: TimePastTheHour
field.semantics: The time past the hour indicated in the Hours field.

field.name: PowerSetting
field.semantics: The power setting of the propulsion system, after any response lags have been incorporated

field.name: EngineRPM
field.semantics: The current engine speed

field.name: HorizontalDeflectionAngle
field.semantics: The nozzle deflection angle in the horizontal body axis of the entity

field.name: VerticalDeflectionAngle
field.semantics: The nozzle deflection angle in the vertical body axis of the entity

field.name: ERP
field.semantics: The average peak radiated power of the emission

field.name: Frequency
field.semantics: The center frequency of the emission

field.name: PgRF
field.semantics: When applied to originators, this field shall specify the number of interrogations per second emitted. This field shall be set to zero when applied to a responder (i.e. transponder) systems

field.name: PulseWidth
field.semantics: The duration of the fundamental pulse of which the interrogation or reply is composed

field.name: BurstLength
field.semantics: The number of emissions generated in a single burst. This field shall contain zero for continuously emitting systems and shall contain the value 1 for responders.

field.name: ApplicableModes
field.semantics: Specifies the modes to which the fundamental paremeter data applies

field.name: AntennaPatternType_A_Alternatives
field.semantics: The type of radiation pattern of the radio\'s antenna.

field.name: CurrentShaftRate
field.semantics: The current shaft speed. A positive shaft speed indicates that the shaft is rotating in a clockwise direction (when viewed from the stern to bow), and a negative shaft speed indicates an anti-clockwise direction.

field.name: OrderedShaftRate
field.semantics: The ordered shaft speed. If the ordered shaft speed is different from the current shaft speed then the shaft will accelerate or decelerate at the shaft rate of change. A positive shaft speed indicates that the shaft is rotating in a clockwise direction (when viewed from the stern to bow), and a negative shaft speed indicates an anti-clockwise direction.

field.name: ShaftRateOfChange
field.semantics: The rate of change of shaft speed. The shaft will change its rotational speed at this rate if the current shaft speed differs from the ordered shaft rate.

field.name: SupplyType
field.semantics: The type of supply

field.name: Quantity
field.semantics: The number of units of the supply type. The unit measure depends on the supply type and shall use the SI units of measurement used for such supplies.

field.name: XAngularVelocity
field.semantics: Acceleration component along the Z axis

field.name: YAngularVelocity
field.semantics: Acceleration component along the Z axis

field.name: ZAngularVelocity
field.semantics: Acceleration component along the Z axis

field.name: Nature
field.semantics: The nature or purpose for the joining of theconstituent part entity to the host entity

field.name: Position
field.semantics: The position of the constituent part entity with respect to the host entity

field.name: RecordType_A_Alternatives
field.semantics: The type of record

field.name: StationNumber
field.semantics: The number of the particular station at which the constituent part is attached

field.name: StationName_A_Alternatives
field.semantics: The name of the station, within the host entity, where the constituent part entity is located

field.name: Range
field.semantics: The range from the specified location

field.name: Bearing
field.semantics: The bearing relative to the specified location

field.name: IsFrozen
field.semantics: Freeze Motion

field.name: IsFrozen

field.name: IsFrozen
field.semantics: Freeze Motion

field.name: IsFrozen

field.name: IsFrozen
field.semantics: Freeze Motion
